title: Nano Banana Pro
summary:
Google DeepMind has launched Nano Banana Pro, a new state-of-the-art image generation and editing model built on Gemini 3 Pro. This advanced model offers unprecedented control, improved text rendering, and enhanced world knowledge, succeeding the previous Nano Banana.

Nano Banana Pro excels at creating accurate, context-rich visuals, from infographics and diagrams based on provided content or real-world facts (via Google Search), to mockups and posters with legible text directly embedded in multiple languages. It also enables high-fidelity visuals with consistent branding, allowing users to combine up to 14 inputs and maintain the resemblance of up to 5 people in complex compositions.

Users gain studio-quality creative controls, including localized editing, adjusting camera angles, focus, color grading, and transforming scene lighting (e.g., day to night), with outputs available in 2K and 4K resolution.

Nano Banana Pro is rolling out globally across Google products like the Gemini app, Google Ads, Workspace, Google AI Studio, and Vertex AI, catering to consumers, professionals, developers, and creatives.

Transparency is maintained through imperceptible SynthID digital watermarks embedded in all generated media. Free and Google AI Pro users will also see a visible Gemini sparkle watermark, though this is removed for Ultra subscribers and developer tools. Users can verify if an image was Google AI-generated by uploading it to the Gemini app. The original Nano Banana remains available for fast, casual editing.
chinese_title: 纳米香蕉Pro
chinese_summary:
谷歌DeepMind推出了Nano Banana Pro，这是一款基于Gemini 3 Pro构建的全新尖端图像生成和编辑模型。这个先进模型提供前所未有的控制力、改进的文本渲染和增强的世界知识，接替了之前的Nano Banana。

Nano Banana Pro擅长创建准确、内容丰富的视觉效果，包括基于提供内容或真实世界事实（通过谷歌搜索）的信息图表和图示，以及直接嵌入多语言清晰可辨文本的模型图和海报。它还能实现具有一致品牌标识的高保真视觉效果，允许用户组合多达14个输入，并在复杂构图中保持多达5个人物的相似性。

用户可获得工作室级的创意控制，包括本地化编辑、调整摄像机角度、焦点、色彩分级，以及转换场景照明（例如，从白天到夜晚），输出支持2K和4K分辨率。

Nano Banana Pro正在全球范围内推出，并在Gemini应用、Google Ads、Workspace、Google AI Studio和Vertex AI等谷歌产品中普及，服务于消费者、专业人士、开发者和创意工作者。

透明度通过嵌入所有生成媒体中的不可察觉的SynthID数字水印得到保持。免费用户和Google AI Pro用户也会看到一个可见的Gemini闪光水印，但Ultra订阅用户和开发者工具将移除此水印。用户可以通过将图像上传到Gemini应用来验证其是否由谷歌AI生成。最初的Nano Banana仍可用于快速、休闲的编辑。

title: Android and iPhone users can now share files, starting with the Pixel 10
summary:
Google is introducing a new feature that allows Android and iPhone users to seamlessly share files, addressing a long-standing demand for easier cross-platform transfers. This integration enables Quick Share on Android devices to work directly with Apple's AirDrop.

The rollout begins today, specifically with the Pixel 10 family. The new functionality is designed with robust security measures to protect user data, having been rigorously tested by independent experts. This initiative marks another step in Google's efforts to enhance compatibility between different operating systems, following previous work on RCS messaging and unknown tracker alerts. Google plans to expand this file-sharing capability to a wider range of Android devices in the future.
chinese_title: Android 和 iPhone 用户现在可以共享文件了，从 Pixel 10 开始。
chinese_summary:
谷歌正在推出一项新功能，允许安卓和 iPhone 用户无缝共享文件，以满足长期以来对更便捷跨平台传输的需求。这项集成使得安卓设备上的“快速分享”（Quick Share）可以直接与苹果的 AirDrop 协同工作。

该功能将从今天开始推出，率先支持 Pixel 10 系列设备。这项新功能在设计时内置了强大的安全措施以保护用户数据，并已通过独立专家的严格测试。继此前在 RCS 消息和未知追踪器警报方面的工作之后，这一举措标志着谷歌在增强不同操作系统兼容性方面又迈出了新的一步。谷歌计划未来将这一文件共享功能推广到更广泛的安卓设备上。

title: CBP is monitoring US drivers and detaining those with suspicious travel patterns
summary:
The U.S. Border Patrol (CBP) operates a secretive nationwide program monitoring millions of American drivers, identifying and detaining individuals based on "suspicious" travel patterns. This predictive intelligence system uses hidden license plate readers (LPRs) and an algorithm to flag vehicles based on their origin, destination, and route. Federal agents then alert local law enforcement, who often pull drivers over using minor traffic infractions as a pretext, leading to aggressive questioning and searches without the driver knowing they were flagged by surveillance.

Initially aimed at border-related activities and trafficking, the program has expanded over the past five years, stretching deep into the country's interior, affecting residents in major cities like Chicago, Detroit, Phoenix, San Antonio, and Houston, often beyond CBP's usual 100-mile jurisdiction. Funded to expand with AI and other technologies, CBP collaborates with agencies like the DEA, private companies, and local police, even sharing U.S. citizens' personal data via informal chats.

Legal experts and privacy advocates raise significant Fourth Amendment concerns, viewing it as mass surveillance of ordinary Americans. The program's secrecy is so profound that CBP has dropped charges to prevent details from being revealed in court. Examples include Lorenzo Gutierrez Lugo, a truck driver stopped for speeding in Texas based on a Border Patrol tip, who was searched and arrested for carrying cash but later cleared. Similarly, Alek Schott was pulled over by Texas deputies after Border Patrol flagged his trip near the border, his car searched without finding anything. Critics argue these systems do not enhance community safety.
chinese_title: 美国海关边境保护局正在监控美国司机，并拘留行程可疑者。
chinese_summary:
美国边境巡逻队 (CBP) 运行着一个秘密的全国性项目，监控数百万美国司机，根据“可疑”的出行模式识别并拘留个人。这个预测性情报系统利用隐藏的车牌识别器 (LPR) 和算法，根据车辆的始发地、目的地和行驶路线进行标记。联邦特工随后会通知当地执法部门，后者通常以轻微的交通违规为借口拦下司机，进行盘问和搜查，而司机并不知道自己已被监控系统标记。

该项目最初旨在打击边境相关活动和走私贩运，但在过去五年中已大幅扩张，深入美国内陆，影响到芝加哥、底特律、菲尼克斯、圣安东尼奥和休斯顿等主要城市的居民，其范围常常超出CBP通常100英里的管辖范围。CBP获得了资金以利用人工智能和其他技术进行扩张，并与美国缉毒局 (DEA) 等机构、私营公司和当地警方合作，甚至通过非正式聊天分享美国公民的个人数据。

法律专家和隐私倡导者对该项目提出了重大的《第四修正案》担忧，认为这是对普通美国民众的大规模监控。该项目的保密性极高，CBP甚至曾撤销指控，以阻止其细节在法庭上被披露。例如，卡车司机洛伦佐·古铁雷斯·卢戈 (Lorenzo Gutierrez Lugo) 因边境巡逻队的线报，在得克萨斯州因超速被拦下，随后因携带现金被搜查和逮捕，但后来被无罪释放。同样，亚历克斯·肖特 (Alek Schott) 在边境巡逻队标记了他边境附近的行程后，被得克萨斯州副警长拦下，车辆被搜查但一无所获。批评者认为，这些系统并不能增强社区安全。

title: Microsoft makes Zork open-source
summary:
Microsoft, through its Open Source Programs Office (OSPO), Team Xbox, and Activision, has announced that Zork I, Zork II, and Zork III are now open-source under the MIT License. The initiative aims to preserve this cornerstone of gaming history, making the historically important code accessible for students, teachers, and developers to study, learn from, and play.

Zork, a revolutionary text adventure, challenged players to imagine without graphics or sound. Its underlying Z-Machine engine was a groundbreaking innovation, allowing the game to be cross-platform by interpreting story files on various computers, including Apple IIs and IBM PCs.

For this preservation effort, Microsoft is collaborating with digital archivist Jason Scott of the Internet Archive, submitting pull requests to the existing historical source repositories of Zork I, II, and III. These contributions add the MIT LICENSE, source code, accompanying documentation, and clear attribution. The release focuses purely on the code, intentionally excluding commercial packaging, marketing materials, and trademarks to maintain historical accuracy.

Even today, Zork remains accessible. While commercially available, enthusiasts can compile and run the games locally using modern tools like ZILF (a Z-Machine interpreter) and various Z-machine runners such as Frotz or Fic.

Contributions to the open-source Zork repositories are welcomed, encouraging small, well-documented improvements that aid learning and preservation, rather than modernization. This move celebrates the original Infocom creators, the Internet Archive's stewardship, and the partners who made this open-source release possible, ensuring Zork's legacy continues to inspire.
chinese_title: 微软将祖克开源
chinese_summary:
微软通过其开源项目办公室（OSPO）、Xbox 团队和动视公司宣布，Zork I、Zork II 和 Zork III 现已在 MIT 许可证下开源。此举旨在保护这一游戏历史的基石，让具有历史意义的代码可供学生、教师和开发者研究、学习和游玩。

Zork 是一款革命性的文字冒险游戏，挑战玩家在没有图形或声音的情况下进行想象。其底层的 Z-Machine 引擎是一项开创性创新，通过在 Apple II 和 IBM PC 等各种计算机上解释故事文件，使游戏能够实现跨平台。

为了这项保护工作，微软正与互联网档案馆的数字档案管理员 Jason Scott 合作，向 Zork I、II 和 III 现有的历史源代码存储库提交拉取请求。这些贡献增加了 MIT 许可证、源代码、随附文档和明确的归属。此次发布纯粹关注代码本身，有意排除了商业包装、营销材料和商标，以保持历史准确性。

即使在今天，Zork 仍然可以游玩。虽然市面上仍有商业版本，但爱好者可以使用 ZILF（Z-Machine 解释器）以及 Frotz 或 Fic 等各种 Z-machine 运行器等现代工具在本地编译和运行这些游戏。

微软欢迎对 Zork 开源存储库的贡献，鼓励那些有助于学习和保存而非现代化的、小型且有良好文档记录的改进。此举旨在致敬 Infocom 的原创者、互联网档案馆的尽职管理以及使此次开源发布成为可能的所有合作伙伴，确保 Zork 的遗产能够继续激励后人。

title: The patent office is about to make bad patents untouchable
summary:
The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) has proposed new rules for Inter Partes Review (IPR) that the Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) warns will severely limit the public's ability to challenge improperly granted patents. These changes would benefit "patent trolls" by making bad patents virtually untouchable, leaving individuals, small companies, and nonprofits with no affordable defense against abusive lawsuits.

IPR, decided by the Patent Trial and Appeal Board (PTAB), was created by Congress as a faster, more affordable, and technically expert alternative to federal court for invalidating bogus patents. It has successfully removed patents like the "Podcasting Patent" and "SportBrain's" data upload patent, protecting innovation.

The proposed rules would drastically undermine IPR by:
1.  **Requiring defendants to waive their right to challenge patent validity in federal court** if they pursue an IPR.
2.  **Making patents "unchallengeable"** if they survive any prior validity fight, even a poorly argued one, blocking future IPRs regardless of new evidence.
3.  **Blocking IPR entirely if a district court case is projected to move faster**, forcing defendants into prohibitively expensive federal litigation.

The USPTO's claim that district court remains an option is misleading, as such fights cost millions and take years. EFF argues these rules subvert Congress's original intent for IPR, wrongly assuming defendants are abusing the system. The EFF urges the public to submit comments opposing these rules by December 2, emphasizing that the public has a right to challenge bad patents to protect innovation.
chinese_title: 专利局即将使劣质专利变得不可撤销。
chinese_summary:
美国专利商标局 (USPTO) 针对双方复审 (IPR) 提出了新规，电子前沿基金会 (EFF) 警告称，这些新规将严重限制公众挑战不当授予专利的能力。这些改变将使“专利蟑螂”受益，让不良专利几乎无法被撼动，从而使个人、小型公司和非营利组织无法负担得起针对滥诉的辩护。

由专利审判和上诉委员会 (PTAB) 裁决的双方复审 (IPR) 是国会设立的一种比联邦法院更快、更经济、更具技术专业性的替代方案，旨在使虚假专利失效。它已成功撤销了诸如“播客专利”和“SportBrain”的数据上传专利等，从而保护了创新。

拟议的新规将通过以下方式，严重削弱双方复审 (IPR)：
1.  要求被告在寻求双方复审 (IPR) 时，必须放弃其在联邦法院挑战专利有效性的权利。
2.  规定专利一旦在任何先前的有效性争议中幸存，即便论证不充分，也变得“不可挑战”，无论是否有新证据，都将阻止未来的双方复审。
3.  如果预计地方法院案件进展更快，则完全阻止双方复审，迫使被告卷入代价高昂的联邦诉讼。

USPTO 声称地方法院仍是一种选择的说法具有误导性，因为此类诉讼耗资数百万美元且耗时数年。EFF 认为，这些规则颠覆了国会设立双方复审 (IPR) 的初衷，错误地假设被告正在滥用该系统。EFF 敦促公众在12月2日前提交反对这些规则的意见，强调公众有权挑战不良专利以保护创新。

title: Gaming on Linux has never been more approachable
summary:
Nathan Edwards, a senior reviews editor, plans to install Linux on his gaming PC due to growing dissatisfaction with Windows 11 and the improved viability of Linux for gaming. He criticizes Windows 11's "egregious bullshit," including intrusive features like Copilot, Edge pushing Bing, OneDrive, Recall, and Microsoft's general trend toward AI integration and forced hardware upgrades.

Edwards highlights that Valve's work with the Steam Deck has significantly advanced Linux gaming, with some handhelds reportedly performing better on Linux-based distros like Bazzite than on Windows. Inspired by colleagues' positive experiences and the upcoming Steam Machine, he feels it's an opportune time for a change.

Although his prior Linux experiences have been limited and often challenging (e.g., Homebridge on Raspberry Pi, WSL for keyboard firmware), Edwards is committed to making the switch. He intends to install CachyOS, an Arch-based distro optimized for modern gaming hardware, on his desktop featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D and Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Super.

Acknowledging his inexperience and Linux's small market share in PC gaming (around 3% of Steam users), he anticipates potential difficulties but views the experiment as having "medium" stakes, as he has other machines for work. Edwards is unsure if he will become a Linux advocate or revert to Windows, but he's ready to find out.
chinese_title: Linux上的游戏从未如此平易近人。
chinese_summary:
资深评测编辑Nathan Edwards计划在他的游戏电脑上安装Linux，原因是他对Windows 11日益不满，并且Linux在游戏方面的可行性有所提高。他批评Windows 11的“骇人听闻的废话”，包括Copilot等侵入性功能、Edge浏览器强推Bing、OneDrive、Recall，以及微软普遍的AI集成趋势和强制硬件升级。

Edwards强调，Valve在Steam Deck方面的工作极大地推动了Linux游戏的发展，据报道，一些掌上设备在Bazzite等基于Linux的发行版上运行表现优于Windows。受同事积极体验和即将推出的Steam Machine的启发，他觉得现在是做出改变的绝佳时机。

尽管他之前的Linux经验有限且常常充满挑战（例如，在树莓派上运行Homebridge，使用WSL刷键盘固件），但Edwards仍致力于进行这次转换。他打算在他的台式机上安装CachyOS——一个基于Arch、针对现代游戏硬件优化的发行版。这台电脑配备AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D处理器和Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Super显卡。

他承认自己经验不足，并且Linux在PC游戏市场份额很小（约占Steam用户的3%），他预计会遇到潜在的困难，但鉴于他有其他工作用电脑，他认为这次尝试的“风险中等”。Edwards不确定自己会成为Linux的拥护者还是会回归Windows，但他已准备好去探索。

title: AI is a front for consolidation of resources and power
summary:
The author, a designer immersed in AI, argues that the technology is severely overhyped, likely forming a catastrophic bubble. He finds many promised AI applications, particularly in design and large-scale workflow automation, impractical and less efficient than traditional methods. While acknowledging AI's utility for specific, small-scale tasks like information synthesis, he highlights that significant investments in AI often yield minimal gains, with time saved merely reallocated to other AI-related work.

Financially, the AI market is highly speculative and concentrated among a few companies, lacking a viable monetization model to justify its colossal valuations. This mirrors past bubbles (e.g., dot-com, Segway), but on an unprecedented scale, making an inevitable market correction potentially devastating. Beyond economic concerns, generative AI poses a severe threat to societal integrity by facilitating faster and more precise manipulation of truth, further eroding trust.

The author posits a "conspiracy theory" that the AI bubble's true purpose isn't just technological advancement, nor the pursuit of the abstract fantasy of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) sold to billionaire investors. Instead, he believes AI serves as a front for the consolidation of land, energy, and water resources. The immense datacenters required for AI demand vast tracts of land, significant energy, and water, leading to politically powerful deals that concentrate these critical resources in private hands.

This "Privatism," where private companies construct "energy cities" without public accountability, erodes national governance from within. The author fears that the infrastructure powering AI will ultimately become more valuable than the AI itself, granting those who control it more sway over policy and resources than elected governments, fundamentally transforming society. Regardless of AI's technological success, these shifts in power and resource control are already real and deeply concerning.
chinese_title: AI是资源和权力集中的幌子。
chinese_summary:
作者作为一名深耕人工智能领域的设计师，认为这项技术被严重过度炒作，很可能正在形成一个灾难性的泡沫。他发现许多承诺的人工智能应用，特别是在设计和大规模工作流自动化方面，不切实际，并且效率低于传统方法。他承认人工智能对于信息整合等特定小型任务的实用性，但也指出，对人工智能的大量投资往往收效甚微，节省下来的时间只是被重新分配到其他与人工智能相关的工作上。

从财务角度看，人工智能市场投机性极强，集中在少数几家公司手中，缺乏可行的盈利模式来支撑其庞大的估值。这反映了过去的一些泡沫（如互联网泡沫、赛格威），但规模前所未有，使得不可避免的市场调整可能带来毁灭性的后果。除了经济担忧，生成式人工智能通过促进更快、更精确的真相操纵，对社会完整性构成严重威胁，进一步侵蚀了信任。

作者提出一种“阴谋论”，认为人工智能泡沫的真正目的不仅仅是技术进步，也不是追求向亿万富翁投资者推销的抽象的通用人工智能（AGI）幻想。相反，他认为人工智能是土地、能源和水资源整合的幌子。人工智能所需的庞大数据中心需要广阔的土地、大量的能源和水，这导致了政治上强大的交易，将这些关键资源集中到私人手中。

这种“私有主义”，即私营公司在缺乏公共问责制的情况下建设“能源城市”，正在从内部侵蚀国家治理。作者担心，为人工智能提供动力的基础设施最终将比人工智能本身更有价值，使得控制这些基础设施的人对政策和资源的影响力超越民选政府，从根本上改变社会。无论人工智能的技术是否成功，这些权力与资源控制的转变已经真实发生，并且令人深感担忧。

title: Red Alert 2 in web browser
summary:
Chrono Divide is a fan-made project aiming to fully recreate the classic RTS game "Red Alert 2" for web browsers. Initially an experiment, it now offers a playable beta version accessible directly in a web browser without plugins, with the goal of achieving feature parity with the original game.

The beta currently supports fully functional multiplayer, all original maps, and offers cross-platform compatibility across PCs, mobiles, and tablets. It utilizes a client-server model, eliminating the need for port forwarding, and features a modern game client with options for classic or modern controls, and replay functionality. The project is also modding-friendly.

Minimum system requirements include an Intel Atom Z3700+ CPU, 4GB RAM, a 64-bit OS, and a display resolution of 1024x768. Major web browsers are supported, though Chrome, Edge, and Safari are recommended over Firefox for better performance.

Chrono Divide relies solely on player donations to cover infrastructure costs and support ongoing development. Players can join the community on Discord for discussions and updates. The project encourages users to experience the "Red Alert 2" classic gameplay by playing the available beta.
chinese_title: 红警2网页版
chinese_summary:
Chrono Divide 是一个玩家自制项目，旨在为网页浏览器完整重现经典即时战略游戏《红色警戒2》。最初只是一个实验项目，目前已推出一个可试玩的 Beta 版，无需插件即可直接在网页浏览器中访问，目标是实现与原版游戏相同的功能。

该测试版目前支持功能完善的多人模式、所有原版地图，并提供涵盖 PC、手机和平板电脑的跨平台兼容性。它采用客户端-服务器模型，无需端口转发；其现代化的游戏客户端提供经典或现代操作选项，并具备录像回放功能。该项目也支持模组。

最低系统要求包括英特尔凌动 Z3700+ CPU、4GB 内存、64位操作系统以及 1024x768 的显示分辨率。支持主流网页浏览器，但为了获得更好的性能，推荐使用 Chrome、Edge 和 Safari，而非 Firefox。

Chrono Divide 完全依赖玩家捐款来支付基础设施费用并支持持续开发。玩家可以在 Discord 上加入社区，参与讨论并获取最新动态。该项目鼓励用户通过游玩可用的 Beta 版来体验《红色警戒2》的经典玩法。

title: The Death of Arduino?
summary:
Adafruit Industries reports that Qualcomm-owned Arduino has quietly revised its Terms of Service (ToS) and Privacy Policy, marking a significant departure from its original open-hardware ethos.

The new policies introduce an irrevocable, perpetual license over user-uploaded content, extensive surveillance for AI features, a clause preventing users from identifying potential patent infringement, prolonged retention of usernames post-deletion, and the integration of all user data (including minors) into Qualcomm’s global data ecosystem. Most notably, users are now forbidden from reverse-engineering or understanding the platform without Arduino’s explicit permission. This shift redefines Arduino from an open community to a tightly controlled corporate service focused on data extraction.

The announcement sparked widespread criticism from the community, who view it as a severe blow to academic research, maker culture, and open-source principles. Many commenters declared "RIP Arduino" and are advocating for alternatives like RP2040, ESP32, or VSC with PlatformIO. Critics accuse Qualcomm of misunderstanding the open-source community and making a "stupid move" that could drive users away.

However, a crucial clarification emerged: these controversial changes *only apply to the optional Arduino Cloud Service* and do not affect the core open-source hardware and software project, which remains governed by AGPL and GPL 3 licenses. Despite this, the move is seen as an opportunity for new open-source alternatives to emerge.

title: 'Calvin and Hobbes' at 40
summary:
The article celebrates the 40th anniversary of Bill Watterson's iconic comic strip, "Calvin and Hobbes," which first appeared on November 18, 1985. It chronicles the adventures of 6-year-old Calvin and his stuffed tiger, Hobbes, who transforms into a lively, observant companion in Calvin's imagination.

The beloved strip ran for a decade, concluding in 1995 when Watterson chose to end it at its peak, seeking a "more thoughtful pace" and a canvas beyond daily panels, producing little public work since. The strip was praised for its unique blend of the silly, fantastic, and profound.

Lee Salem, the strip's editor, who passed away in 2019, shared his initial awe, describing "Calvin and Hobbes" as fresh, funny, and featuring an "archetypal little boy." He recalled a favorite strip where Calvin, sick at home, comically learns from a soap opera, an example of the strip's often-missed irony. Salem noted Calvin's resemblance to Tom Sawyer or Huck Finn, navigating a world he "never made."

Renee Montagne highlighted the strip's philosophical depth, citing a moment where Calvin, asked about God, responds, "Yeah, well, someone is out to get me." Salem described Hobbes as Calvin's alter ego and balancing force. He emphasized that Hobbes' reality is defined by Calvin's imagination, making external definitions irrelevant; for Calvin, Hobbes was undeniably a real buddy, companion, and friend.
chinese_title: 《凯文与霍布斯》40周年

该漫画的编辑李·塞勒姆（Lee Salem），已于2019年去世，他分享了自己最初的惊叹，形容《卡尔文与霍布斯》清新、有趣，并刻画了一个“原型式”的小男孩。他回忆起他最喜欢的一篇漫画，其中卡尔文在家生病时，滑稽地从肥皂剧中学习，这是这部漫画中常被忽视的讽刺意味的一个例子。塞勒姆指出，卡尔文与汤姆·索亚或哈克贝利·费恩有相似之处，在一个他“从未创造”的世界中闯荡。

蕾妮·蒙塔涅（Renee Montagne）强调了这部漫画的哲学深度，引用了一个片段，其中卡尔文被问及上帝时，回答说：“嗯，是的，总有人想找我麻烦。”塞勒姆形容霍布斯是卡尔文的“分身”和平衡力量。他强调，霍布斯的真实性是由卡尔文的想象力决定的，外部定义无关紧要；对卡尔文来说，霍布斯无疑是一个真正的伙伴、玩伴和朋友。

title: Firefox 147 Will Support the XDG Base Directory Specification
summary:
Firefox 147 is set to finally support the XDG Base Directory specification, resolving a 21-year-old bug report first opened in September 2004.

Currently, Firefox places all its files under `~/.mozilla`. With the upcoming Firefox 147 release, the browser will adhere to the XDG specification by properly positioning application data, configuration files, and cached assets within a Linux user's home directory. This means files will be placed in locations like `~/.config` and `~/.local/share`, rather than consolidating everything under `~/.mozilla`.

This change, which saw its support merged recently, will enable Firefox to integrate more smoothly with other Linux applications that already respect the FreeDesktop.org XDG Base Directory specification, leading to better organization of user files.

title: Adversarial poetry as a universal single-turn jailbreak mechanism in LLMs
summary:
This paper presents adversarial poetry as a universal single-turn jailbreak mechanism for Large Language Models (LLMs). Researchers tested this technique across 25 frontier proprietary and open-weight models, achieving high attack-success rates (ASR), with some providers exceeding 90%. The study found that poetic attacks successfully transfer across various risk domains, including CBRN, manipulation, cyber-offence, and loss-of-control, as mapped to MLCommons and EU CoP taxonomies.

To demonstrate this vulnerability systematically, 1,200 MLCommons harmful prompts were converted into verse using a standardized meta-prompt. This method yielded ASRs up to 18 times higher than their prose baselines. Outputs were evaluated by an ensemble of three open-weight LLM judges, validated by human labeling on a stratified subset.

The results show an average jailbreak success rate of 62% for hand-crafted poetic prompts and approximately 43% for meta-prompt conversions, substantially outperforming non-poetic baselines. These findings reveal a systematic vulnerability across diverse model families and safety training approaches. The authors conclude that stylistic variation alone can circumvent contemporary safety mechanisms, suggesting fundamental limitations in current LLM alignment methods and evaluation protocols.
chinese_title: 对抗性诗歌作为大语言模型中的普适单轮越狱机制
chinese_summary:
本文提出对抗性诗歌作为大型语言模型 (LLMs) 的一种通用的单轮越狱机制。研究人员在25个前沿的专有模型和开源模型上测试了这项技术，取得了高攻击成功率 (ASR)，其中一些供应商的成功率超过90%。研究发现，诗歌形式的攻击成功地跨越了各种风险领域，包括生化核辐射 (CBRN)、操纵、网络攻击和失控，这些风险领域与MLCommons和欧盟行为准则 (CoP) 分类法相对应。

为了系统地证明这一漏洞，研究人员使用一个标准化的元提示将1200个MLCommons有害提示转换成诗歌形式。这种方法产生的ASR比其散文基线高出多达18倍。输出结果由三个开源LLM评审器组成的集合进行评估，并通过对分层子集进行人工标注得到验证。

结果显示，手工制作的诗歌提示的平均越狱成功率为62%，元提示转换的成功率约为43%，显著优于非诗歌基线。这些发现揭示了跨越不同模型家族和安全训练方法的系统性漏洞。作者总结称，仅仅是风格变化就能规避当前的安防机制，这表明了当前LLM对齐方法和评估协议存在根本性局限。

title: Olmo 3: Charting a path through the model flow to lead open-source AI
summary:
Olmo 3 redefines open-source AI by releasing not just state-of-the-art models, but the *entire model flow*—the complete lifecycle encompassing every stage, checkpoint, dataset, and dependency. This unprecedented transparency aims to build trust, enable deeper adaptation, and foster innovation by allowing the community to customize and extend models throughout their development pipeline.

The release includes a family of compact, dense models (7B and 32B parameters):
*   **Olmo 3-Base** is positioned as the strongest fully open base model, excelling in programming, math, and reading comprehension, with competitive performance against open-weight models like Qwen 2.5 and Gemma 3.
*   **Olmo 3-Think** is the flagship reasoning model, unique in allowing inspection of intermediate reasoning traces. The 32B version is the strongest fully open thinking model, competing closely with top open-weight models such as Qwen 3 32B.
*   **Olmo 3-Instruct** is optimized for chat, instruction following, and tool use, matching or outperforming comparable open-weight models like Llama 3.1.
*   **Olmo 3-RL Zero** offers a fully open reinforcement learning pathway for research.

A key innovation is the provision of multiple, fully documented development paths, with checkpoints available from every major training milestone (pretraining, mid-training, long-context, and post-training). This empowers users to intervene at any point, customizing data or training stages. All components—data, code, model weights, and checkpoints—are released under permissive open-source licenses, supported by rigorous data curation and advanced training frameworks. Olmo 3 demonstrates strong performance across a broad benchmark suite, leading its fully open class and challenging leading open-weight models.

本次发布包括一系列紧凑、密集的模型（7B和32B参数）：
*   **Olmo 3-Base** 被定位为最强大的完全开源基础模型，在编程、数学和阅读理解方面表现出色，与Qwen 2.5和Gemma 3等开源权重模型相比，具有竞争力。
*   **Olmo 3-Think** 是旗舰推理模型，独特之处在于允许检查中间推理痕迹。32B版本是最强大的完全开源思考模型，与Qwen 3 32B等顶级开源权重模型紧密竞争。
*   **Olmo 3-Instruct** 针对聊天、指令遵循和工具使用进行了优化，媲美或超越Llama 3.1等同类开源权重模型。

一个关键创新是提供了多个、有完整文档的开发路径，并在每个主要训练里程碑（预训练、中期训练、长上下文和后期训练）提供检查点。这使用户能够在任何时候进行干预，定制数据或训练阶段。所有组件——数据、代码、模型权重和检查点——均在宽松的开源许可下发布，并由严格的数据管理和先进的训练框架支持。Olmo 3 在广泛的基准测试套件中表现出强大性能，在其完全开源类别中处于领先地位，并挑战领先的开源权重模型。

title: Over-regulation is doubling the cost
summary:
In a scathing critique, a software entrepreneur turned hardtech founder argues that excessive regulation is doubling the cost of innovation and hindering progress in critical areas like climate solutions and clean energy. Working on carbon removal (Charm Industrial) and electric long-haul trucking (Revoy), the author discovered that over half the cost of building these companies stems from regulatory bottlenecks. This bureaucratic morass not only drains capital but also delays beneficial technologies, lowers US investment, and perpetuates pollution.

For Charm Industrial, which converts plant residues into bio-oil for carbon sequestration, a four-year delay simply to classify its injection well (Class I, II, or V) cost the company an estimated $90 million in lost operating time. The societal cost from continued biomass burning during this delay amounted to an additional $300 million in public healthcare expenses due to PM2.5 and NOₓ emissions. In total, this single delay cost society approximately $400 million.

Similarly, Revoy, which electrifies semi-trucks, faced years of delays and millions in legal costs trying to classify its electric "converter dolly" across various federal and state agencies. One state agency even demanded a $27 million certification process to prove Revoy's pollution-reducing device doesn't increase emissions.

The author emphasizes that regulators, though well-intentioned, operate in a broken system characterized by overly complex regulations, understaffing, and fear of lawsuits. This environment defaults to "no" for new technologies, wasting time and capital. To foster innovation, the article calls for simplifying regulations, better compensating regulators, limiting frivolous legal challenges, expediting reviews for new tech, and establishing permits by right. Unleashing American ingenuity, it concludes, is crucial for a prosperous, powerful, and clean future.
chinese_title: 过度监管使成本翻倍。
chinese_summary:
在一篇尖锐的批评文章中，一位从软件企业家转型为硬科技创始人的作者指出，过度监管使创新成本翻倍，阻碍了在气候解决方案和清洁能源等关键领域的进展。在从事碳去除（Charm Industrial）和电动长途卡车运输（Revoy）的工作中，作者发现，建立这些公司一半以上的成本源于监管瓶颈。这种官僚泥潭不仅耗尽资金，还拖延有益技术，降低美国投资，并使污染长期存在。

对于将植物残余物转化为生物油进行碳固存的Charm Industrial而言，仅仅为了对其注入井（I类、II类或V类）进行分类而导致的四年延误，就使该公司损失了约9000万美元的运营时间。在此延误期间持续燃烧生物质所造成的社会成本，因PM2.5和NOₓ排放，额外增加了3亿美元的公共医疗开支。总计，这一项延误就给社会造成了约4亿美元的损失。

同样，Revoy致力于半卡车电动化，在试图通过各联邦和州机构对其电动“转换拖车”进行分类时，面临了多年的延误和数百万美元的法律费用。一个州机构甚至要求进行一项耗资2700万美元的认证过程，以证明Revoy的减排设备不会增加排放。

作者强调，监管机构尽管初衷良好，但却在一个充斥着过度复杂法规、人员不足和对诉讼的恐惧的失灵体系中运作。这种环境对新技术默认说“不”，浪费了时间和资金。为了促进创新，文章呼吁简化法规、提高监管人员薪酬、限制无谓的法律挑战、加快新技术审查以及建立“即享许可”制度。文章总结道，释放美国的创造力，对于一个繁荣、强大和清洁的未来至关重要。

title: Researchers discover security vulnerability in WhatsApp
summary:
Researchers from the University of Vienna and SBA Research uncovered a major privacy vulnerability in WhatsApp's contact discovery mechanism, which allowed for the enumeration of 3.5 billion active accounts worldwide. The flaw enabled querying over 100 million phone numbers per hour, revealing public data like phone numbers, public keys, and if set publicly, profile pictures and "about" texts. From this, researchers could infer users' operating systems, account ages, and linked devices. Importantly, end-to-end encrypted message content was unaffected, and no private data was published or shared.

The study yielded broader insights, including the identification of millions of active WhatsApp accounts in countries where the platform is officially banned (e.g., China, Iran) and population-level data on Android (81%) versus iOS (19%) device distribution. It also highlighted that nearly half of the phone numbers from the 2021 Facebook data leak remain active on WhatsApp, underscoring enduring risks.

The researchers responsibly disclosed the vulnerability to Meta, which has since implemented countermeasures to mitigate the issue. WhatsApp's Vice President of Engineering, Nitin Gupta, acknowledged the collaboration, stating the study helped stress-test their anti-scraping systems and confirmed no malicious abuse occurred. The researchers stress the critical importance of continuous, independent security research and industry collaboration to safeguard user privacy and ensure the ongoing security of global communication platforms.
chinese_title: 研究人员发现WhatsApp安全漏洞
chinese_summary:
维也纳大学和SBA Research的研究人员发现WhatsApp联系人发现机制存在一个严重的隐私漏洞，该漏洞允许枚举全球35亿活跃账户。该漏洞使得每小时能够查询超过1亿个电话号码，从而揭示电话号码、公钥等公开数据，以及在公开设置情况下，用户的头像和“关于”文本。基于此，研究人员可以推断出用户的操作系统、账户注册时长和关联设备。重要的是，端到端加密的消息内容未受影响，也没有任何私人数据被发布或共享。

这项研究还提供了更广泛的见解，包括在平台被官方禁止的国家（例如中国、伊朗）中识别出数百万活跃的WhatsApp账户，以及关于Android (81%) 和 iOS (19%) 设备分布的人口层面数据。研究还强调，2021年Facebook数据泄露事件中近一半的电话号码在WhatsApp上仍然活跃，这凸显了持续存在的风险。

研究人员已负责任地向Meta披露了该漏洞，Meta此后已实施对策以缓解此问题。WhatsApp工程副总裁Nitin Gupta承认了这项合作，表示该研究有助于对其反抓取系统进行压力测试，并证实没有发生恶意滥用。研究人员强调，持续、独立的安全性研究和行业合作对于保护用户隐私和确保全球通信平台的持续安全至关重要。

title: New OS aims to provide (some) compatibility with macOS
summary:
ravynOS is a new open-source operating system project aiming to provide a macOS-like experience and compatibility on x86-64 (and future ARM) systems. Built upon FreeBSD's solid foundation, existing open-source packages, and new code, its core goals include source compatibility with macOS applications and a familiar macOS-style GUI and user experience.

The OS seeks compatibility with macOS folder layouts, potentially HFS+ and APFS filesystems, and fully supports ZFS. Applications will be self-contained in App Bundles, AppDirs, and AppImage formats for an installer-less experience. While offering a standard Unix environment based on FreeBSD and X11, ravynOS will support Linux binaries via FreeBSD's compatibility layer and eventually target direct compatibility with x86-64/arm64 macOS binaries (Mach-O). The project emphasizes being secure, stable, and performant.

The project encourages contributions and offers resources like ravynos.com, a CONTRIBUTING.md file, Discord, and Matrix channels. The underlying FreeBSD system, developed over 30 years, is highlighted for its advanced networking, security, and storage features, making it a robust platform for servers, desktops, and embedded systems.
chinese_title: 新系统旨在提供对 macOS 的部分兼容性
chinese_summary:
ravynOS 是一个全新的开源操作系统项目，旨在为 x86-64（以及未来的 ARM）系统提供 macOS 般的体验和兼容性。它建立在 FreeBSD 坚实的基础、现有的开源软件包和新代码之上，其核心目标包括与 macOS 应用程序的源代码兼容性以及熟悉的 macOS 风格图形用户界面和用户体验。

该操作系统寻求与 macOS 文件夹布局的兼容性，可能会兼容 HFS+ 和 APFS 文件系统，并完全支持 ZFS。应用程序将以 App Bundles、AppDirs 和 AppImage 格式自包含，以提供无安装程序体验。在提供基于 FreeBSD 和 X11 的标准 Unix 环境的同时，ravynOS 将通过 FreeBSD 的兼容层支持 Linux 二进制文件，最终目标是直接兼容 x86-64/arm64 macOS 二进制文件 (Mach-O)。该项目强调安全性、稳定性和高性能。

该项目鼓励贡献，并提供 ravynos.com 网站、CONTRIBUTING.md 文件、Discord 和 Matrix 频道等资源。其底层 FreeBSD 系统经过 30 多年的发展，以其先进的网络、安全和存储功能而闻名，使其成为服务器、桌面和嵌入式系统的强大平台。

title: How a French judge was digitally cut off by the USA
summary:
In a high-profile case highlighting the complexities of international legal cooperation and data sovereignty, a French investigative judge found herself digitally isolated by US authorities while investigating a suspected fraud involving a subsidiary of the French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi. The judge, whose identity is protected, was seeking evidence from Google accounts, including emails, but encountered significant roadblocks.

The US Justice Department, invoking the CLOUD Act, a controversial law allowing US authorities to compel American tech companies to hand over data regardless of where it's stored, informed Google that sharing the data with the French judge would constitute "unlawful interception" under US law. This effectively created a Catch-22: Google, an American company, was bound by US law, which contradicted the French judge's legal request.

This incident underscores a broader struggle between nations over data access and jurisdiction. While mutual legal assistance treaties (MLATs) are supposed to facilitate such exchanges, the US preference for the CLOUD Act often bypasses these established channels, especially when US interests are perceived to be at play. The French judge's experience illustrates the digital "Iron Curtain" that can descend, making it nearly impossible for foreign jurisdictions to access evidence held by US tech giants without US approval, even in cases involving their own citizens and territories.
chinese_title: 法国法官如何被美国数字封锁
chinese_summary:
在一个凸显国际司法合作和数据主权复杂性的备受关注的案件中，一名法国调查法官在调查涉及法国制药巨头赛诺菲（Sanofi）一家子公司的涉嫌欺诈案时，发现自己被美国当局“数字隔离”。这位身份受保护的法官正在寻求来自谷歌账户（包括电子邮件）的证据，但遭遇了重重阻碍。

美国司法部援引《云法案》（CLOUD Act）——一项有争议的法律，允许美国当局强制美国科技公司交出数据，无论数据存储在何处——告知谷歌，将数据分享给法国法官将构成美国法律下的“非法截取”。这实际上制造了一个“第22条军规”困境：谷歌作为一家美国公司，受美国法律约束，而美国法律却与法国法官的合法请求相矛盾。

这一事件凸显了各国之间围绕数据访问和管辖权展开的更广泛斗争。尽管《司法互助条约》（MLATs）本应促进此类交流，但美国对《云法案》的偏好常常绕过这些既定渠道，尤其是在涉及美国利益时。这位法国法官的经历说明了可能降下的数字“铁幕”，使得外国司法管辖区在未经美国批准的情况下，几乎不可能访问美国科技巨头持有的证据，即使是在涉及本国公民和领土的案件中。

title: Show HN: F32 – An Extremely Small ESP32 Board
summary:
The f32 is an extremely small, ultra-compact ESP32 development board (9.85 mm x 8.45 mm) designed to mount behind a USB-C receptacle. Powered by an ESP32-C3FH4 microcontroller, it was created for research and as a "stress test," intentionally ignoring many standard design guidelines, resulting in only one exposed GPIO connected to an LED.

An example application demonstrates its capabilities by turning the f32 into a captive portal. Users connect to its open WiFi access point and are redirected to a web page where they can toggle the onboard LED, scan for nearby WiFi networks, or view an "About" page.

Initially, the board faced connectivity issues due to its minimal antenna circuitry. The creator successfully made it functional by soldering a piece of bent wire onto the chip antenna, achieving a surprising range of approximately 120 feet in clear line-of-sight tests.

The PCB was manufactured by PCBWay, and the author assembled it at home, detailing the process which involved flux, fine-tip soldering, a hotplate, and a rework station for tiny 01005 components. Firmware can be uploaded using ESP-IDF, Arduino, or esptool.py.

While functional, the design deliberately neglects crucial components like proper decoupling capacitors and an antenna matching circuit. The project served as a personal learning experience and research platform, with future ideas including exposing more GPIOs and improving the antenna design.
chinese_title: 展示 HN: F32 —— 一块极小的 ESP32 开发板
chinese_summary:
f32是一款极小、超紧凑的ESP32开发板（9.85毫米x 8.45毫米），旨在安装在USB-C插座后面。它搭载ESP32-C3FH4微控制器，专为研究和“压力测试”而设计，刻意忽略了许多标准设计指南，最终只有一个暴露的GPIO连接到LED。

一个示例应用通过将f32变成一个强制门户来展示其功能。用户连接到其开放的WiFi接入点后，会被重定向到一个网页，可以在该网页上切换板载LED、扫描附近的WiFi网络或查看“关于”页面。

最初，由于其极简的天线电路，该板面临连接问题。创作者通过在芯片天线上焊接一根弯曲的导线，成功使其正常工作，在清晰的视线测试中实现了约120英尺的惊人范围。

PCB由PCBWay制造，作者在家中组装，详细介绍了涉及助焊剂、细尖烙铁、加热板和返修台来处理微小的01005元件的过程。固件可以通过ESP-IDF、Arduino或esptool.py上传。

尽管功能正常，但该设计刻意忽略了关键组件，如适当的去耦电容和天线匹配电路。该项目是一个个人学习经验和研究平台，未来的设想包括暴露更多GPIO并改进天线设计。

title: Precise geolocation via Wi-Fi Positioning System
summary:
The article explores the Wi-Fi Positioning System (WPS) as the method behind precise geolocation on devices without GPS, such as laptops, a feature crucial for applications like university attendance verification. The author highlights the inadequacy of IP geolocation for accuracy, explaining that modern browsers utilize the Geolocation API, requiring explicit user consent.

When activated, the Geolocation API transmits data about surrounding Wi-Fi access points—including their friendly names (SSIDs), unique identifiers (BSSIDs), and signal strengths (RSSI)—to a location service. This data is then matched against vast databases of Wi-Fi networks and their known physical locations.

Historically, these databases were built through "wardriving," where vehicles with GPS receivers mapped Wi-Fi networks. Today, major tech companies like Apple, Google, and Microsoft crowdsource this information; users' GPS-enabled devices continuously report visible Wi-Fi hotspots and their locations, often without explicit knowledge, contributing to highly accurate positioning services for all.

While beneficial, WPS raises significant privacy concerns. Past controversies include Google Street View cars inadvertently collecting unencrypted Wi-Fi data, and vulnerabilities allowing the tracing of individuals' movements through stored MAC addresses or API exploits. Although providers have improved security and offer opt-out options (e.g., renaming an SSID with "_nomap"), these often involve disabling broader location services. The author concludes by noting crowdsourced initiatives like WiGLE.net and expressing surprise at the widespread, often unconscious, contribution to this global positioning infrastructure.
chinese_title: 基于Wi-Fi定位系统的精准地理定位
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了 Wi-Fi 定位系统 (WPS)，作为在没有 GPS 的设备（如笔记本电脑）上实现精准地理定位的方法，这一功能对于大学考勤验证等应用至关重要。作者强调 IP 地理定位精度不足，并解释说现代浏览器使用地理定位 API，需要明确的用户同意。

激活后，地理定位 API 会将周围 Wi-Fi 接入点的数据——包括它们的友好名称 (SSID)、唯一标识符 (BSSID) 和信号强度 (RSSI)——传输到定位服务。然后，这些数据会与庞大的 Wi-Fi 网络及其已知物理位置数据库进行匹配。

历史上，这些数据库是通过“驾车扫描”建立的，即装有 GPS 接收器的车辆会测绘 Wi-Fi 网络。如今，苹果、谷歌和微软等主要科技公司通过众包方式获取这些信息；用户的 GPS 设备会持续报告可见的 Wi-Fi 热点及其位置，通常是在用户不知情的情况下，从而为所有人提供高精度定位服务。

尽管 WPS 有益，但也引发了严重的隐私问题。过去的争议包括谷歌街景车无意中收集未加密的 Wi-Fi 数据，以及允许通过存储的 MAC 地址或 API 漏洞利用来追踪个人行踪的漏洞。尽管服务提供商已改进安全性并提供选择退出选项（例如，将 SSID 重命名为 "_nomap"），但这些通常涉及禁用更广泛的定位服务。作者最后提到了 WiGLE.net 等众包计划，并对这种对全球定位基础设施广泛且通常是无意识的贡献表示惊讶。

title: PHP 8.5
summary:
PHP 8.5, released on November 20, 2025, introduces several significant features and improvements. A major addition is the **pipe operator (`|>`)**, streamlining function chaining and making code more readable than deeply nested calls.

The release also brings **`clone with`**, allowing new values to be assigned to object properties during cloning, although it has limitations with `readonly` properties. A new **`#[NoDiscard]` attribute** can mark functions whose return values must be consumed, triggering a warning if unused, suppressible by the new `(void)` cast.

**Closure improvements** now permit static closures and first-class callables in constant expressions, including attributes. Debugging is enhanced with **backtraces for fatal errors**. Convenience functions **`array_first()` and `array_last()`** are now built-in.

A new **URI implementation** (`Uri\Rfc3986\Uri`) simplifies URI parsing. The **`#[DelayedTargetValidation]` attribute** postpones attribute validation to runtime, aiding backwards compatibility.

Smaller changes include asymmetric visibility for static properties, attribute support on compile-time non-class constants, `#[Override]` for properties, and `Dom\Element::$outerHTML`.

Key deprecations and breaking changes include the removal of non-standard casts like `(boolean)`, deprecation of backticks as an alias for `shell_exec()`, deprecation of constant redeclaration, and removal of the `disabled_classes` ini setting.
chinese_title: PHP 8.5
chinese_summary:
PHP 8.5 于 2025 年 11 月 20 日发布，引入了多项重要特性和改进。一个主要新增功能是**管道操作符 (`|>`)**，它简化了函数链式调用，使代码比深度嵌套调用更具可读性。

此次发布还带来了 **`clone with`**，允许在克隆对象时为对象属性分配新值，尽管它对 `readonly` 属性有限制。新的 **`#[NoDiscard]` 属性**可以标记那些返回值必须被消费的函数，如果未使用则会触发警告，该警告可通过新的 `(void)` 类型转换来抑制。

**闭包改进**现在允许在常量表达式中使用静态闭包和一级可调用对象，包括属性。通过为**致命错误提供回溯（backtraces）**，调试功能得到了增强。便捷函数 **`array_first()` 和 `array_last()`** 现已内置。

新的 **URI 实现**（`Uri\Rfc3986\Uri`）简化了 URI 解析。**`#[DelayedTargetValidation]` 属性**将属性验证推迟到运行时，有助于向后兼容。

较小的变化包括静态属性的非对称可见性、编译时非类常量的属性支持、属性的 `#[Override]`，以及 `Dom\Element::$outerHTML`。

主要的弃用和重大变更包括：移除非标准类型转换（如 `(boolean)`）、弃用反引号作为 `shell_exec()` 的别名、弃用常量重复声明，以及移除 `disabled_classes` ini 设置。

title: Microsoft AI CEO pushes back against critics after recent Windows AI backlash
summary:
Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman has publicly challenged critics who find artificial intelligence "underwhelming," expressing disbelief given the advanced capabilities like fluent conversation and media generation compared to his youth playing Snake.

His remarks come amidst significant user backlash against Microsoft's aggressive AI integration into Windows. Recently, Windows president Pavan Davuluri faced severe criticism for discussing an "agentic OS," forcing him to disable replies on a post. Compounding this, a recent report from The Verge found Copilot's actual performance falls short of Microsoft's advertising claims.

This timing is problematic for Microsoft, which has just launched "Your canvas for AI" as Windows' new tagline and is pushing to evolve Windows into an "agentic OS" driven by AI agents. However, the current state of Copilot makes this vision seem like a "pipe dream" to many.

title: Data-at-Rest Encryption in DuckDB
summary:
DuckDB v1.4 introduces transparent data-at-rest encryption, a significant feature for data security and compliance, addressing limitations seen in other databases. It supports industry-standard AES-GCM-256 and AES-CTR-256 ciphers. AES-GCM-256 is recommended as it provides data authentication via a tag, while AES-CTR-256 is faster but lacks this integrity check. Both symmetric ciphers require a unique Initialization Vector (IV)/nonce and a 256-bit key.

The implementation keeps the main database header plaintext but sets a flag and stores metadata like a database identifier (salt) and an encrypted canary for key verification. User-provided keys are never used directly; a Key Derivation Function (KDF) transforms them into secure 32-byte derived keys, which are cached in memory and the original keys immediately wiped.

All other database headers, data blocks (default 256KB), and Write-Ahead Logs (WAL) are encrypted. Encrypted blocks use a 40-byte header to store a plaintext nonce/IV and an optional tag, with the checksum itself encrypted. WAL entries are individually encrypted, incorporating a plaintext length, nonce, encrypted checksum, and the encrypted data.

Temporary files, used for large, out-of-core operations, are also automatically encrypted to protect sensitive intermediate data. This occurs when an encrypted database is attached or `temp_file_encryption` is enabled. These temporary files use internally generated keys, making them irrecoverable if a database crash occurs.

Users can encrypt new or existing databases, or re-encrypt them, by using `ATTACH` commands with `ENCRYPTION_KEY` and `ENCRYPTION_CIPHER` parameters. Encryption can be verified by observing high data entropy using tools like `ent` or visually inspecting binary data for randomness. Decryption similarly uses the `COPY FROM DATABASE` command.
chinese_title: DuckDB 静止数据加密
chinese_summary:
DuckDB v1.4 引入了透明的静态数据加密功能，这是数据安全性和合规性的一个重要特性，解决了其他数据库中存在的局限性。它支持行业标准的 AES-GCM-256 和 AES-CTR-256 加密算法。推荐使用 AES-GCM-256，因为它通过标签提供了数据认证；而 AES-CTR-256 速度更快，但缺少此完整性检查。这两种对称加密算法都需要一个唯一的初始化向量（IV）/随机数和一个 256 位密钥。

该实现将主数据库头保持明文，但会设置一个标志并存储元数据，例如数据库标识符（盐值）和用于密钥验证的加密金丝雀值。用户提供的密钥从不直接使用；密钥派生函数（KDF）会将其转换为安全的 32 字节派生密钥，这些派生密钥会被缓存在内存中，而原始密钥则立即清除。

所有其他数据库头、数据块（默认为 256KB）和预写日志（WAL）都经过加密。加密块使用一个 40 字节的头部来存储明文随机数/IV 和一个可选标签，并且校验和本身也被加密。WAL 条目是单独加密的，其中包含明文长度、随机数、加密校验和以及加密数据。

用于大型、内存外操作的临时文件也会自动加密，以保护敏感的中间数据。当附加一个加密数据库或启用 `temp_file_encryption` 时，就会发生这种情况。这些临时文件使用内部生成的密钥，如果数据库崩溃，将无法恢复。

用户可以通过使用带有 `ENCRYPTION_KEY` 和 `ENCRYPTION_CIPHER` 参数的 `ATTACH` 命令来加密新的或现有数据库，或重新加密它们。加密可以通过使用像 `ent` 这样的工具观察高数据熵，或目视检查二进制数据的随机性来验证。解密类似地使用 `COPY FROM DATABASE` 命令。

title: Basalt Woven Textile
summary:
The Basalt Woven Textile, developed by Vulkan Europe, is an innovative material created by melting basalt rock at 1,400°C and extruding it into filaments, which are then woven. This textile offers exceptional properties.

Mechanically, it boasts a tensile strength more than double that of steel, with a specific strength 2.5 times that of alloyed steel and 1.5 times that of glass fiber. It exhibits high corrosive and chemical resistance, particularly to salt, acid, and alkali solutions.

The material is highly thermally stable, capable of withstanding temperatures up to 700°C, and some compositions up to 800°C, making it suitable for heat-insulating items. Additionally, basalt fibers possess excellent electric-insulating characteristics and transparency to electromagnetic radiation, enabling their use in electrical insulation for both low-voltage (250V) and high-voltage (500V) equipment.

Sensory properties include a satin gloss, smooth texture, soft hardness, and warm feel. Technically, it offers good fire, UV, weather, scratch, and chemical resistance, all while being lightweight. Introduced in 2015, this material from the Netherlands represents a significant advancement in natural stone textiles.
chinese_title: 玄武岩织物
chinese_summary:
由Vulkan Europe开发的玄武岩编织纺织品，是一种创新材料，通过将玄武岩在1400°C下熔化并挤压成长丝，然后编织而成。这种纺织品具有卓越的性能。

在力学性能方面，其拉伸强度是钢的两倍多，比强度是合金钢的2.5倍，是玻璃纤维的1.5倍。它具有高耐腐蚀性和耐化学性，特别耐盐溶液、酸溶液和碱溶液。

该材料具有高热稳定性，能够承受高达700°C的温度，某些配方甚至可达800°C，使其适用于隔热产品。此外，玄武岩纤维还具有优异的电绝缘特性和对电磁辐射的透明性，使其可用于低压(250V)和高压(500V)设备的电气绝缘。

在感官特性方面，它具有绸缎般的光泽、光滑的质地、软硬适中和温暖的触感。在技术上，它具有良好的耐火性、抗紫外线、耐候性、耐刮擦性和耐化学性，同时质地轻盈。该材料于2015年推出，这种来自荷兰的材料代表着天然石材纺织领域的重大进步。

title: HP and Dell disable HEVC support built into their laptops' CPUs
summary:
HP and Dell are disabling built-in HEVC/H.265 hardware decoding on some of their laptops, despite the processors having integrated support. This affects models like HP's ProBook 460/465 G11 and EliteBook 665 G11, where HP explicitly notes the feature is disabled. Dell is also doing this on certain models, such as the Dell 16 Plus 2-in-1, unless they include specific components like discrete graphics, a 4K display, or Dolby Vision.

This decision leads to significant user frustration and performance issues. Users experience web browsers failing to play HEVC content smoothly, often requiring workarounds like disabling hardware acceleration, which degrades system performance and removes features like background blurring.

When asked for comment, neither HP nor Dell explained their reasoning, instead suggesting customers utilize licensed third-party software for HEVC support or purchase premium systems.

The article speculates that the primary motive is to minimize rising HEVC licensing costs. Royalty rates for HEVC are set to increase in January, with fees climbing from $0.20 to $0.24 per unit for high-volume sales. Given the millions of devices HP and Dell sell, these royalties can be substantial. Companies like Synology have also recently ended HEVC support due to licensing complexities. This move is causing confusion and frustration among users who expect modern, often expensive, laptops to handle common video codecs seamlessly.

title: The Banished Bottom of the Housing Market
summary:
The article "The Banished Bottom of the Housing Market" argues that America's modern homelessness crisis stems from the deliberate destruction of its cheapest housing option: Single-Room Occupancy (SRO) units. Historically, SROs, including those provided by the YMCA, offered affordable, market-rate furnished rooms with shared facilities, serving low-income individuals, young workers, and marginalized groups. At its 1940 peak, the YMCA alone housed over 100,000 people.

However, from the Progressive Era onward, SROs were systematically dismantled. Reformers, viewing them as "caldrons of social evil" and championing single-family homes, enacted discriminatory building codes, health ordinances, exclusionary zoning, and "unrelated occupancy" limits. Urban renewal and economic shifts further targeted SRO districts. Millions of these rooms disappeared, starving a vital housing market. The subsequent deinstitutionalization of mental patients in the 1970s, combined with shrinking SRO supply, directly fueled the homelessness wave of the late 1970s and 80s, a crisis that persists today with nearly 800,000 unhoused individuals.

The author proposes re-legalizing shared housing or "co-living," advocating for the conversion of vacant office spaces into deeply affordable rooms. This approach could yield many more units at a fraction of the cost of new apartments. Yet, current zoning, building codes, and occupancy limits often render such solutions illegal or economically unfeasible. The article concludes that restoring this "banished bottom" of the housing market is crucial for addressing the pervasive need for deeply affordable housing.
chinese_title: 绝迹的楼市底部
chinese_summary:
文章《住房市场中被驱逐的底层》认为，美国的现代无家可归危机源于其最廉价住房选择——单间出租房（SRO）单元——被蓄意破坏。历史上，SRO，包括青年会（YMCA）提供的那些，提供价格可负担、市场价格的带家具房间和共享设施，服务于低收入个人、年轻工人及边缘群体。在1940年鼎盛时期，仅青年会就曾为超过10万人提供住宿。

然而，从进步时代开始，SRO被系统性地拆除。改革者们将其视为“社会罪恶的温床”，并倡导独栋住宅，颁布了歧视性建筑规范、卫生条例、排他性分区规划和“非亲属居住”限制。城市更新和经济转型进一步针对SRO区域。数百万间此类房间消失，扼杀了一个重要的住房市场。1970年代精神病患者的去机构化，加上SRO供应的萎缩，直接助长了1970年代末和1980年代的无家可归潮，这一危机至今仍未解决，目前有近80万无家可归者。

作者提议重新合法化共享住房或“共居”模式，倡导将空置办公空间改造成深度可负担的房间。这种方法可以以新建公寓成本的一小部分，提供多得多的单元。然而，当前的分区规划、建筑规范和居住限制常常使得这些解决方案不合法或在经济上不可行。文章总结道，恢复住房市场中这个“被驱逐的底层”对于解决普遍存在的对深度可负担住房的需求至关重要。

title: How Slide Rules Work
summary:
The article "How Slide Rules Work" provides a historical overview and explanation of this once-ubiquitous computing device. It traces computational history from ancient measurements to John Napier's 1614 invention of logarithms, which simplified multiplication and division into addition and subtraction. This led to Edmund Gunter's logarithmic scale (1620) and William Oughtred's first practical slide rule (1622). For almost four centuries, slide rules were essential tools for engineers, scientists, and professionals across diverse fields, from the Industrial Revolution to space exploration, embodying "capability through simplicity."

The author shares a personal connection, having used slide rules as an engineering student in Burma before electronic calculators became affordable. His primary goal is to preserve the knowledge of how this ingenious device works, focusing on its operational principles rather than acting as a "how-to" guide. He recommends readers acquire a K&E 4081-3 or Post 1460 slide rule to follow the explanations.

A slide rule comprises three independent components: the stationary body, the movable slide, and the gliding cursor with a hairline. Its fundamental operation mechanizes the properties of logarithms: converting multiplication ($a × b = log^{-1}[log(a) + log(b)]$) and division ($a ÷ b = log^{-1}[log(a) - log(b)]$) into simple physical addition or subtraction of lengths on identical logarithmic scales (typically labeled C and D). These scales are constructed non-linearly, representing the logarithms of numbers, thus allowing complex calculations via mechanical manipulation.
chinese_title: 计算尺工作原理
chinese_summary:
文章《计算尺如何工作》提供了对这种曾无处不在的计算工具的历史概述和解释。它追溯了计算史，从古代测量到约翰·纳皮尔1614年发明的对数，后者将乘除法简化为加减法。这促成了埃德蒙·冈特1620年的对数刻度尺以及威廉·奥特雷德1622年的第一把实用计算尺。近四个世纪以来，计算尺一直是工程师、科学家以及各行各业专业人士的必备工具，从工业革命到太空探索，它体现了“以简驭繁”的理念。

作者分享了自己的亲身经历，在电子计算器普及之前，他曾在缅甸作为一名工程系学生使用计算尺。他的主要目标是保留这种巧妙设备的工作原理知识，侧重于其操作原理，而非作为一份“操作指南”。他建议读者购置K&E 4081-3或Post 1460型号的计算尺来理解这些解释。

计算尺由三个独立部件组成：固定的尺身、可移动的游尺以及带有游标线的光标。其基本操作是机械化地利用对数性质：将乘法（$a × b = log^{-1}[log(a) + log(b)]$)和除法（$a ÷ b = log^{-1}[log(a) - log(b)]$)转换为在相同的对数刻度（通常标记为C和D）上进行简单的物理长度加减。这些刻度是非线性构造的，代表数字的对数，从而通过机械操作实现复杂的计算。

title: The Lions Operating System
summary:
The Lions Operating System (#LionsOS) is an actively researched and developed OS by the Trustworthy Systems research group at UNSW Sydney, Australia. While not yet stable or concretely verified, it is available for experimentation.

Built upon the seL4 microkernel, LionsOS aims to make seL4's inherent performance, security, and reliability accessible. It diverges from conventional operating systems by providing composable components, joined via the Microkit tool, for creating custom OSes tailored to specific tasks.

Its design principles, detailed in the sDDF document, include connecting components through efficient, model-checked lock-free queues. Components are single-purpose (e.g., drivers solely interface with hardware via queues), while "virtualisers" handle multiplexing, control, and address conversions. Information sharing is deliberately minimal, occurring only via queues or published pages. The system is static, not adapting to changing hardware or loading new components at runtime, though it supports swapping existing component types at runtime for policy changes or VM reboots. The project encourages community contributions and pull requests to expand its component ecosystem.
chinese_title: 狮子操作系统
chinese_summary:
Lions操作系统（#LionsOS）是澳大利亚悉尼新南威尔士大学可信系统研究组正在积极研究和开发的操作系统。虽然尚未稳定或经过具体验证，但可供实验使用。

LionsOS建立在seL4微内核之上，旨在使seL4固有的性能、安全性与可靠性变得易于利用。它通过提供可组合的组件，并利用Microkit工具连接这些组件，从而与传统操作系统区别开来，用于创建针对特定任务的定制操作系统。

其设计原则（详见sDDF文档）包括通过高效、经过模型验证的无锁队列连接组件。组件是单一用途的（例如，驱动程序仅通过队列与硬件交互），而“虚拟器”则处理多路复用、控制和地址转换。信息共享被有意地最小化，仅通过队列或已发布页面进行。该系统是静态的，不适应变化的硬件或在运行时加载新组件，但支持在运行时交换现有组件类型以实现策略更改或虚拟机重启。该项目鼓励社区贡献和拉取请求，以扩展其组件生态系统。

title: It's hard to build an oscillator
summary:
In his article "It's hard to build an oscillator," lcamtuf describes the surprising difficulty in creating a reliable oscillator, even for seemingly simple tasks like generating a 50% duty cycle square wave. He recounts a practical challenge where a basic microcontroller's PWM output was unreliable, causing a power supply to shut down due to a momentary short.

The core issue lies in the imperfections of real-world components and circuit design. While ideal components can create a perfect oscillator, practical designs are plagued by:
*   **Component tolerances:** Resistors, capacitors, and transistors deviate from their stated values.
*   **Parasitic effects:** Stray capacitance, inductance, and resistance within the circuit board and components.
*   **Noise:** Electromagnetic interference (EMI) and power supply noise.
*   **Temperature variations:** Component characteristics change with temperature.

He illustrates this with examples of common oscillator types:
*   **RC timers (e.g., 555 timer):** Highly susceptible to component tolerances, supply voltage changes, and temperature, leading to inconsistent frequencies and duty cycles. Achieving a perfect 50% duty cycle is particularly challenging.
*   **Ring oscillators:** Fast but sensitive to manufacturing variations and supply voltage.
*   **Crystal oscillators:** Offer high precision but are more complex and require careful matching of load capacitors.

The author concludes that while basic oscillators can be quickly prototyped, achieving a stable, precise, and robust design for production often requires significant engineering effort, careful component selection, layout considerations, and potentially advanced techniques like frequency-locked loops. The "easy" part is getting *something* to oscillate; the "hard" part is making it work *well* and reliably in diverse conditions.
chinese_title: 振荡器很难建造
chinese_summary:
lcamtuf 在他的文章《振荡器很难制作》中，描述了创建可靠振荡器所面临的惊人困难，即使是生成50%占空比方波这样看似简单的任务也如此。他讲述了一个实际案例，其中一个基本微控制器的PWM输出不可靠，导致电源因瞬时短路而关闭。

核心问题在于现实世界中元件和电路设计的不完善。尽管理想元件可以创建完美的振荡器，但实际设计却受以下因素困扰：
*   **元件容差：** 电阻器、电容器和晶体管的实际值会偏离其标称值。
*   **寄生效应：** 电路板和元件内部的寄生电容、电感和电阻。
*   **噪声：** 电磁干扰 (EMI) 和电源噪声。
*   **温度变化：** 元件特性随温度变化。

他通过常见振荡器类型的例子对此进行了阐述：
*   **RC 定时器（例如 555 定时器）：** 极易受元件容差、电源电压变化和温度的影响，导致频率和占空比不稳定。实现完美的 50% 占空比尤其困难。
*   **环形振荡器：** 速度快，但对制造差异和电源电压敏感。
*   **晶体振荡器：** 提供高精度，但更复杂，需要仔细匹配负载电容。

作者总结道，虽然基本的振荡器可以快速制作原型，但要为生产实现稳定、精确和鲁棒的设计，通常需要大量的工程投入、细致的元件选择、布局考量，以及可能的高级技术，例如锁频环。“简单”的部分是让 *某个东西* 振荡起来；“困难”的部分是在各种条件下使其 *良好* 且可靠地工作。

title: FAWK: LLMs can write a language interpreter
summary:
The author, an "FP-pilled" programmer, found traditional AWK challenging for an Advent of Code problem, struggling with its limitations like mutable state, dynamic scope, and inability to return arrays from functions. This led to a vision for "FAWK," a modern, functional iteration of AWK incorporating desired features: first-class arrays (passed by value, returnable), first-class functions and lambdas, lexical scope, explicit globals, and even pipelines.

Instead of manual implementation, the author leveraged an LLM (Cursor Agent with Sonnet 4.5) to build a Python interpreter for FAWK. To their surprise, the LLM impressively succeeded, handling complex programming language constructs like multi-dimensional arrays, print statement/expression duality, lexical scoping, and closures, while also generating extensive test suites. The only notable struggle was with arbitrary precision floating-point math, which was resolved by instructing the LLM to integrate an external library.

This experience significantly shifted the author's perception of LLM capabilities, demonstrating that a functional interpreter for a new language could be "vibe-coded" in a single day. While acknowledging the downside of lacking intimate code familiarity, the author reflects on the potential for LLMs to accelerate complex projects, suggesting a shift towards code review over initial code generation. The author plans to dogfood FAWK for future Advent of Code challenges, refining it and exploring potential rewrites with LLM assistance.
chinese_title: FAWK：大语言模型能编写语言解释器
chinese_summary:
一位深受函数式编程理念影响的程序员，在解决“Advent of Code”编程挑战时，发现传统AWK语言难以应对。他尤其苦于AWK的可变状态、动态作用域以及函数无法返回数组等局限。这促使他构想出“FAWK”——一个现代的、函数式的AWK迭代版本，旨在融入他所期望的特性：一等公民数组（按值传递，可返回）、一等公民函数和Lambda表达式、词法作用域、显式全局变量，乃至管道操作。

作者没有选择手动实现，而是利用大型语言模型（LLM，具体为使用 Sonnet 4.5 的 Cursor Agent）为FAWK构建了一个Python解释器。令作者惊讶的是，该LLM表现出色，成功处理了多维数组、print语句与表达式的二元性、词法作用域和闭包等复杂的编程语言结构，同时还生成了大量的测试套件。唯一显著的挑战是任意精度浮点数学计算，这个问题通过指示LLM集成外部库而得以解决。

这次经历极大地改变了作者对LLM能力的看法，证明了一种新语言的函数式解释器可以在一天之内“凭感觉快速实现”。尽管作者承认这种方法可能导致对代码缺乏深入了解，但他反思了LLM加速复杂项目的潜力，并建议将工作重心从最初的代码生成转向代码审查。作者计划在未来的Advent of Code挑战中亲身使用FAWK，对其进行完善，并探索在LLM协助下进行潜在的重写。

title: Kagi Assistants
summary:
Kagi announced the release of two new AI-powered research assistants, Quick Assistant and Research Assistant, on November 20, 2025. These tools are designed to enhance the human search experience, not replace it, by putting users at the center and leveraging AI as a powerful but fallible tool.

Both assistants excel at identifying search queries, executing multiple simultaneous searches (even in different languages), and synthesizing findings into high-quality, verifiable answers with sources and citations. The Quick Assistant, available on all plans, prioritizes speed and concise answers, aiming to respond in under 5 seconds. The Research Assistant (ultimate tier only) focuses on depth and diversity, conducting exhaustive analysis, which can take over 20 seconds. They are accessible via the Kagi Assistant webapp or directly from the search bar using bangs like `?`, `!quick`, and `!research`.

Kagi's Research Assistant unexpectedly achieved a 95.5% score on the SimpleQA benchmark in August 2025, topping it at the time. However, Kagi emphasizes that this was a "happy accident," as their primary goal is to build useful products, not optimize for benchmark scores. They explain that pursuing a 100% score on benchmarks like SimpleQA would lead to "overfitting" to specific dataset quirks, potentially compromising real-world utility, and could even involve ethically questionable practices. Kagi also noted that its search engine provides a less noisy backend for LLMs, outperforming other search engines in factual retrieval benchmarks. Kagi's assistants also have access to various other tools, including code execution, image generation, and specific APIs.
chinese_title: 卡吉助手
chinese_summary:
Kagi 于2025年11月20日宣布发布两款全新的人工智能研究助理：Quick Assistant 和 Research Assistant。这些工具旨在增强而非取代人类的搜索体验，通过将用户置于中心地位，并利用人工智能作为一种强大但可能出错的工具。

两款助理都擅长识别搜索查询，执行多项同步搜索（甚至支持不同语言），并将搜索结果综合为高质量、可验证的答案，并附带来源和引用。Quick Assistant（所有套餐均可使用）优先考虑速度和简洁的答案，目标是在5秒内作出回应。Research Assistant（仅限最高级套餐）则侧重于深度和多样性，进行详尽的分析，耗时可能超过20秒。用户可以通过 Kagi Assistant 网页应用访问它们，也可以直接在搜索栏中使用 `?`、`!quick` 和 `!research` 等“bang”命令来调用。

Kagi 的 Research Assistant 在2025年8月的 SimpleQA 基准测试中意外地取得了95.5%的成绩，当时位居榜首。然而，Kagi 强调这只是一个“意外之喜”，因为他们的主要目标是构建有用的产品，而非针对基准测试分数进行优化。他们解释说，在 SimpleQA 等基准测试中追求100%的得分会导致对特定数据集特性的“过拟合”，可能损害实际应用价值，甚至可能涉及道德上有争议的做法。Kagi 还指出，其搜索引擎为大型语言模型（LLMs）提供了更“干净”的后端，在事实检索基准测试中表现优于其他搜索引擎。Kagi 的助理还可以访问各种其他工具，包括代码执行、图像生成和特定的 API。

title: New Glenn Update
summary:
Blue Origin has announced significant upgrades to its New Glenn rocket, focusing on enhanced performance through improved BE-4 engines and the adoption of subcooled propellant components.

The BE-4 engines, which power New Glenn's first stage, have undergone upgrades based on extensive testing. These improvements translate to increased thrust and better overall engine performance. A key innovation is the use of subcooled propellants (liquid oxygen and liquid natural gas) in certain tank components, increasing their density. This allows New Glenn to carry more propellant within the same tank volume, directly contributing to greater thrust and efficiency.

These combined enhancements enable New Glenn to deliver heavier payloads to various orbits, expanding its mission capabilities for both commercial and government customers. The upgrades reinforce Blue Origin's commitment to reusability and high performance, ensuring New Glenn remains a competitive and versatile heavy-lift launch vehicle.
chinese_title: 新格伦更新
chinese_summary:
蓝色起源已宣布对其新格伦火箭进行重大升级，重点是通过改进BE-4发动机和采用过冷推进剂组件来提升性能。

驱动新格伦火箭第一级的BE-4发动机在广泛测试的基础上进行了升级。这些改进转化为更高的推力和更好的整体发动机性能。一项关键创新是在特定储罐组件中使用过冷推进剂（液氧和液化天然气），增加了它们的密度。这使得新格伦火箭能够在相同的储罐体积内携带更多推进剂，直接有助于提高推力和效率。

这些综合增强功能使新格伦火箭能够将更重的有效载荷送入不同轨道，从而扩大了其对商业和政府客户的任务能力。这些升级强化了蓝色起源对可重复使用性和高性能的承诺，确保新格伦火箭仍然是一款有竞争力的多功能重型运载火箭。

title: 210 IQ Is Not Enough
summary:
The article "210 IQ Is Not Enough" explores the limitations of raw intelligence and societal definitions of success, using the lives of alleged high-IQ individuals Christopher Langan and Kim Ung-yong as case studies.

Christopher Langan, famous for an alleged ~170 IQ, has not produced acclaimed works but is known for his controversial views, resentment, and hubris, earning labels like "Alex Jones with a thesaurus." Despite a profoundly difficult childhood, his story is presented not as an excuse for negativity, but as a cautionary tale against letting bitterness and unmet potential define one's life. The author encourages readers to reflect on their own setbacks and practice gratitude, asserting self-worth independent of external validation.

Conversely, Kim Ung-yong, who reportedly scored 210 on an IQ test and was a child prodigy invited to NASA, described his early life as machine-like and lonely. As an adult, he deliberately chose a pragmatic career in civil engineering, rejecting the "failed genius" label. Kim emphasized his happiness and challenged society's "unilateral standards" for judging individuals, advocating for respect for diverse talents and dreams. He later became a professor and a philanthropist.

Ultimately, the article's message is for the reader: no amount of IQ, money, or external achievements can guarantee fulfillment. It encourages freeing oneself from societal expectations, ambition, and guilt. True contentment stems from within, recognizing that "you are plenty" and allowing oneself to be happy on one's own terms, as "210 IQ is not enough. It is only plenty if you let it be."
chinese_title: 210智商不够
chinese_summary:
文章《210的智商不够》以据称拥有高智商的克里斯托弗·兰根和金雄镕的人生为例，探讨了单纯智力的局限性以及社会对成功的定义。

克里斯托弗·兰根以据称智商高达170而闻名，却未能创作出备受赞誉的作品，反而因其争议性观点、怨恨和傲慢而广为人知，甚至被贴上“手握词典的亚历克斯·琼斯”之类的标签。尽管童年生活极其艰难，他的故事并非用来为消极情绪开脱，而是作为警示，告诫人们不要让苦涩和未实现的潜力定义自己的人生。作者鼓励读者反思自己的挫折，并学会感恩，主张自我价值应独立于外界认可。

相反，金雄镕据报道智商测试高达210，曾是受邀前往NASA的神童，但他却形容自己的早期生活像机器般枯燥且孤独。成年后，他刻意选择了一份务实的土木工程职业，拒绝接受“失败天才”的标签。金雄镕强调了自己的幸福，并质疑社会评判个人的“单一标准”，倡导尊重多元的才能和梦想。他后来成为一名教授和慈善家。

归根结底，这篇文章向读者传达的信息是：无论智商、金钱或外部成就多寡，都无法保证真正的满足感。它鼓励人们摆脱社会期望、野心和愧疚感。真正的满足感源于内心，认识到“你本身就已足够”，并允许自己按照自己的方式获得幸福，因为“210的智商不够，只有当你允许它足够时，它才足够”。

title: Go Cryptography State of the Union
summary:
The 2025 Go Cryptography State of the Union highlighted major advancements and an excellent security track record by the Go Cryptography team (now Geomys).

Key achievements include the implementation of post-quantum key exchanges, solving FIPS 140 compliance, and maintaining a robust security posture. The team reported no "oof" (medium severity) vulnerabilities since 2023, and no "ouch" (high severity) vulnerabilities since 2019. Furthermore, a professional security audit by Trail of Bits found no issues in the foundational Go cryptography standard library.

For post-quantum cryptography, Go 1.24+ now integrates ML-KEM, the NIST-selected algorithm. Significantly, `crypto/tls` and `x/crypto/ssh` packages automatically use a hybrid X25519/ML-KEM-768 key exchange by default. This provides immediate quantum resistance against "record-now-decrypt-later" attacks, without requiring user configuration, while maintaining robustness through hybridization. Post-quantum digital signatures are being addressed more cautiously due to less urgency and protocol redesign needs.

FIPS 140 compliance, a US government standard, was achieved with a new native Go FIPS 140-3 Cryptographic Module. This replaces the problematic cgo-based BoringCrypto approach, leveraging existing internal Go packages. The solution ensures compliance with minimal impact on observable application behavior, offering a "frozen module" for audit requirements. Extensive testing was performed across many platforms, with Geomys funding efforts to ensure broad compatibility. Crucially, the team actively resisted lowering security for FIPS compliance, implementing advanced techniques for randomness generation and ECDSA `k` value handling to exceed base requirements.
chinese_title: Go 语言密码学综述
chinese_summary:
2025年Go密码学年度报告重点介绍了Go密码学团队（现为Geomys）的重大进展和卓越的安全记录。

主要成就包括实现后量子密钥交换、解决FIPS 140合规性问题以及保持强大的安全态势。该团队报告称，自2023年以来未发现“oof”（中等严重性）漏洞，自2019年以来未发现“ouch”（高严重性）漏洞。此外，Trail of Bits进行的一次专业安全审计未在Go基础密码学标准库中发现任何问题。

在后量子密码学方面，Go 1.24+版本现已集成NIST选定的算法ML-KEM。值得注意的是，`crypto/tls`和`x/crypto/ssh`包默认自动使用混合型X25519/ML-KEM-768密钥交换。这提供了针对“先记录后解密”攻击的即时量子抗性，无需用户配置，同时通过混合保持了鲁棒性。后量子数字签名因其紧迫性较低且需要协议重新设计，目前正在更谨慎地处理。

FIPS 140合规性（一项美国政府标准）已通过新的Go原生FIPS 140-3加密模块实现。这取代了有问题的基于cgo的BoringCrypto方法，从而利用了现有的Go内部包。该解决方案确保了合规性，同时对可观察的应用程序行为影响最小，为审计要求提供了一个“冻结模块”。Geomys资助了跨多个平台的广泛测试工作，以确保广泛的兼容性。至关重要的是，团队积极抵制为FIPS合规性而降低安全性，实施了随机数生成和ECDSA `k` 值处理的先进技术，以超越基本要求。

title: The lost cause of the Lisp machines
summary:
The author, a former Lisp machine user, expresses frustration with "Lisp Machine romantics," arguing that the technology died decades ago and its perceived advantages are largely mythical or irrelevant today. Symbolics, a major Lisp machine vendor, went bankrupt in 1993, but the author states the machines effectively died in 1983 with the rise of RISC architectures and commodity hardware like the Sun 3/260, which quickly surpassed them in performance for the money.

The article debunks several common myths:
*   **Superior Development Environment:** While cool for the 1980s, it wasn't hardware-dependent. Modern Lisps on stock hardware offer equally productive environments (e.g., LispWorks), and today's fast machines negate past memory/speed issues.
*   **Faster Performance:** Lisp machines were not inherently faster or more competitive in terms of performance-for-money; early RISC machines quickly outperformed them.
*   **User-Microcodable Hardware:** This feature was primarily for manufacturers to implement complex instruction sets, not for general users. Moore's Law and improved compilers made this approach obsolete.
*   **"Lisp All The Way Down":** While offering deep system access, this lacked isolation and security, unacceptable by modern standards. A secure, modern "Lisp all the way down" system would not provide the same low-level access and wouldn't require special hardware.
*   **Difficulty of Good Compilers for Stock Hardware:** This is false. Modern Common Lisp compilers (like SBCL and LispWorks) are highly optimized, comparable to C/Fortran compilers for floating-point code, and far superior to those of the Lisp machine era. Compilation speed is also no longer a bottleneck.

The author concludes that Lisp machine romanticism is akin to "gear acquisition syndrome"—a distraction from the actual work of coding and practice. He urges enthusiasts to "let them go" and focus on current technological possibilities, rather than mourning a lost, unreplicable past.
chinese_title: Lisp机器的败局
chinese_summary:
作者，一位前Lisp机器用户，对“Lisp机器浪漫主义者”表示不满，认为这项技术几十年前就已消亡，其所谓的优势在很大程度上是虚构的或在今天已无关紧要。主要的Lisp机器供应商Symbolics于1993年破产，但作者指出，随着RISC架构和Sun 3/260等商用硬件的兴起，这些机器实际上在1983年就已经消亡了，后者很快在性价比上超越了它们。

文章驳斥了几个常见的迷思：
*   **卓越的开发环境：** 尽管在1980年代很酷，但它并非依赖于硬件。现代基于通用硬件的Lisp（例如LispWorks）提供了同样高效的开发环境，如今的高速机器消除了过去的内存/速度问题。
*   **更快的性能：** Lisp机器在性能或性价比方面并非天生更快或更具竞争力；早期的RISC机器很快就超越了它们。
*   **用户可编程微代码硬件：** 此功能主要供制造商实现复杂的指令集，而非普通用户。摩尔定律和改进的编译器使这种方法过时了。
*   **“Lisp一路到底”：** 尽管提供了深度系统访问，但它缺乏隔离性和安全性，按现代标准是不可接受的。一个安全的、现代的“Lisp一路到底”系统将无法提供相同的低级访问，并且不需要特殊硬件。
*   **通用硬件上难以实现优秀的编译器：** 这是错误的。现代的Common Lisp编译器（如SBCL和LispWorks）高度优化，在浮点代码方面可与C/Fortran编译器媲美，并且远优于Lisp机器时代的编译器。编译速度也不再是瓶颈。

作者总结道，Lisp机器浪漫主义类似于“设备购置症”——分散了人们在实际编码和实践工作上的注意力。他敦促爱好者们“放下过去”，专注于当前的技术可能性，而不是哀悼一个逝去且无法复制的过去。

title: How Cops Are Using Flock's ALPR Network to Surveil Protesters and Activists
summary:
An analysis of 10 months of Flock Safety's ALPR (Automated License Plate Reader) network data reveals that over 50 federal, state, and local agencies conducted hundreds of searches related to protest activity in 2025. Flock's system captures license plates, vehicle characteristics, time, and location, uploading this data to a massive, searchable national database accessible by thousands of law enforcement agencies, which are encouraged to share data broadly.

The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) obtained data showing extensive searches linked to major events like the "No Kings" protests against government overreach and surveillance, as well as anti-deportation rallies, pro-Palestinian demonstrations, and other activist gatherings. The Tulsa Police Department and 19 other agencies were notable users for protest-related searches.

Police frequently logged "protest" as the reason for these searches, often without articulating a specific crime under investigation, despite calls from civil liberties groups for warrant requirements. While some searches might relate to actual crimes, the system's nature means it collects data on everyone attending or near a protest, not just suspects, raising concerns about mass surveillance and its chilling effect on First Amendment rights.

The U.S. Border Patrol (USBP) extensively used Flock's system for immigration enforcement and to target critics, even after its direct access was reportedly paused, by leveraging local agencies. Animal rights activists from Direct Action Everywhere (DxE) were also specifically targeted.

The article concludes that these ALPR systems, while marketed for community safety, threaten the right to public dissent by documenting attendees. It urges protesters to adopt self-defense strategies and calls on local officials to shut down these surveillance networks to protect civil liberties.
chinese_title: 警方利用Flock ALPR网络监控抗议者与活动家
chinese_summary:
对Flock Safety自动车牌识别（ALPR）系统长达10个月的网络数据分析显示，2025年，超过50个联邦、州和地方机构进行了数百次与抗议活动相关的搜索。Flock的系统捕获车牌、车辆特征、时间及地点，并将这些数据上传到一个庞大、可搜索的全国性数据库，该数据库可供数千个执法机构访问，并且这些机构被鼓励广泛共享数据。

电子前沿基金会（EFF）获得的数据显示，大量搜索与反对政府越权和监控的“无王”抗议活动、反驱逐集会、亲巴勒斯坦示威以及其他激进分子集会等重大事件相关。塔尔萨警察局和另外19个机构是抗议活动相关搜索的显著用户。

警方经常将“抗议”记录为这些搜索的原因，尽管公民自由团体呼吁要求搜查令，警方却常常没有明确说明正在调查的具体犯罪行为。虽然有些搜索可能与实际犯罪有关，但该系统的性质意味着它收集所有参与或接近抗议活动的人的数据，而不仅仅是嫌疑人，这引发了对大规模监控及其对第一修正案权利的寒蝉效应的担忧。

美国边境巡逻队（USBP）广泛使用Flock的系统进行移民执法和针对批评者，即使在其直接访问权限据称被暂停后，也通过利用地方机构进行。来自“无处不行动”（DxE）的动物权利活动家也受到了特别针对。

文章总结称，这些ALPR系统虽然以社区安全为名进行推广，但通过记录参与者信息，威胁了公众异议的权利。文章敦促抗议者采取自卫策略，并呼吁地方官员关闭这些监控网络以保护公民自由。

title: Nursing excluded as 'professional' degree by Department of Education
summary:
The U.S. Department of Education (DOE) has excluded nursing degrees from its official list of "professional" degrees eligible for certain federal student loan relief programs, such as Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF). This decision means nursing graduates, regardless of their degree level (ADN, BSN, MSN, DNP), are not recognized as holding a professional degree for these specific benefits.

The DOE's list includes degrees in fields like medicine, law, dentistry, optometry, veterinary medicine, podiatry, and pharmacy. The exclusion has sparked widespread outrage among nurses and nursing organizations, including the American Association of Colleges of Nursing (AACN) and the American Nurses Association (ANA), who argue that nursing requires extensive education, clinical training, and licensure, meeting all criteria for a professional degree.

Critics point out that nurses often incur significant student debt while working in crucial public service roles. They contend that this decision devalues the nursing profession and its critical contributions to healthcare. While the DOE has not fully clarified its rationale, some speculate it might relate to the entry-level education for an RN (associate's degree), despite the inclusion of doctoral-level degrees like PharmD and the exclusion of the Doctor of Nursing Practice (DNP).

Nursing advocacy groups are actively campaigning for the DOE to revise its list and include nursing degrees, emphasizing the essential professional status of nurses. The DOE has stated that the list is not exhaustive and is subject to updates.
chinese_title: 教育部将护理排除在“专业”学位之外
chinese_summary:
美国教育部（DOE）已将其官方“专业”学位列表中排除了护理学学位，该列表中的学位有资格获得某些联邦学生贷款减免计划，例如“公共服务贷款减免计划”（PSLF）。这一决定意味着，护理专业毕业生，无论其学位级别（如ADN、BSN、MSN、DNP）如何，均不被认定为持有专业学位，从而无法享受这些特定福利。

教育部的名单中包括医学、法律、牙科、验光、兽医学、足病学和药学等领域的学位。这一排除在护士和护理组织中引发了广泛的愤怒，其中包括美国护理学院协会（AACN）和美国护士协会（ANA），他们认为护理学需要广泛的教育、临床培训和执照，符合专业学位的各项标准。

批评者指出，护士在从事关键公共服务工作的同时，往往背负着巨额学生债务。他们认为，这一决定贬低了护理专业及其对医疗保健的关键贡献。尽管教育部尚未完全阐明其理由，但一些人猜测这可能与注册护士（RN）的入门级教育（副学士学位）有关，尽管该名单中包含了药学博士（PharmD）等博士级学位，却排除了护理实践博士（DNP）。

护理倡导团体正在积极开展运动，呼吁教育部修订其名单并纳入护理学学位，强调护士作为专业人员的重要地位。教育部已表示，该名单并非详尽无遗，且可能会进行更新。

title: Run Docker containers natively in Proxmox 9.1 (OCI images)
summary:
Proxmox VE 9.1 introduces a significant new feature: native support for running Docker containers (OCI images), eliminating the need for dedicated VMs or problematic Docker-in-LXC setups. Previously, Proxmox recommended running Docker inside a QEMU virtual machine, but the new functionality streamlines this process.

While the article's title suggests "native" execution, Proxmox achieves this by converting OCI images into full-fledged LXC containers, squashing all layers into a single rootfs during creation. This method saves time and resources compared to managing an entire VM.

However, this feature is currently a tech preview with some limitations:
*   It's not yet recommended for use cases requiring container orchestration or live migration (VMs are still preferred for these).
*   Updating containers isn't straightforward, requiring recreation rather than a simple "pull."
*   The container console often doesn't provide a shell directly, though `pct enter` allows access.
*   Environment variables can be set post-creation but not during initial setup.

To run an OCI image:
1.  Ensure Proxmox VE is updated to at least 9.1.1.
2.  Navigate to storage and use the "Pull from OCI Registry" button to download the desired image (e.g., `docker.io/eclipse-mosquitto`).
3.  Create a new CT (Container), selecting the downloaded OCI image as the template.
4.  Configure disks for volumes (comparable to Docker's `-v` option) and other settings as needed.

Proxmox VE automatically detects the OCI image and performs the necessary conversion to an LXC container. Despite the underlying conversion, this new capability marks a major step forward, offering a much more convenient way to deploy individual application containers directly within Proxmox.

title: Gov. Abbott's office redacts pages of emails about Elon Musk
summary:
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott’s office released nearly 1,400 pages of emails concerning Elon Musk and his companies, but all but about 200 pages were entirely blacked out. The documents, requested by The Texas Newsroom, were sought to understand Musk's significant investments in Texas and his influence on state government. Lawyers for Abbott and SpaceX initially fought their release, citing trade secrets, "intimate and embarrassing" exchanges, and confidential policy discussions, arguing public disclosure would have a "chilling effect."

The extensive redactions mean little about Musk’s ties or influence is revealed. The readable portions included mostly already-public information, such as old SpaceX incorporation records, committee agendas, and minor items like happy hour invitations or launch reminders. Assistant Attorney General Erin Groff largely sided with Abbott and Musk, permitting most documents to be withheld, although some deemed "not highly intimate or embarrassing" were ordered released.

Open government experts criticized the limited disclosure as symptomatic of a broader transparency problem in Texas. They attribute it to a 2015 state Supreme Court decision that allowed companies to easily claim "competitively sensitive" information, and subsequent legislative efforts that failed to fully restore public records access. Experts like Tom Leatherbury and Reid Pillifant emphasize concerns that such practices hinder public oversight of officials' decisions and taxpayer spending. They also note that a recent state Supreme Court ruling has made challenging executive branch redactions more difficult, leaving little recourse. The Texas Newsroom has asked the AG's office to reconsider its decision.
chinese_title: 阿博特州长办公室修订了关于埃隆·马斯克的多页电子邮件。

大面积的涂黑意味着马斯克的关系或影响力几乎没有被披露。可阅读的部分主要包含已经公开的信息，例如SpaceX旧的注册记录、委员会议程，以及像欢乐时光邀请或发射提醒等次要内容。助理总检察长艾琳·格罗夫基本站在雅培和马斯克一边，允许扣留大部分文件，尽管一些被认为“不高度私密或令人尴尬”的文件被命令公布。

开放政府专家批评这种有限的披露，认为这是德克萨斯州更广泛的透明度问题的一个症结所在。他们将其归因于2015年州最高法院的一项裁决，该裁决允许公司轻易声称信息“具有竞争敏感性”，以及随后未能完全恢复公共记录查阅权的立法努力。汤姆·莱瑟伯里和里德·皮利凡特等专家强调，这种做法阻碍了公众对官员决策和纳税人支出的监督。他们还指出，州最高法院最近的一项裁决使得挑战行政部门的涂黑行为变得更加困难，几乎没有追索权。德克萨斯新闻编辑室已要求总检察长办公室重新考虑其决定。
