title: Arduino published updated terms and conditions: no longer an open commons
summary:
Qualcomm's recent acquisition of Arduino has led to updated terms and conditions, confirming fears within the maker community that Arduino is no longer an open commons. The new terms, described as corporate boilerplate, include mandatory arbitration, data integration, and export controls. Most critically, they explicitly state that using the platform grants no patent licenses, raising concerns Qualcomm could assert patents against projects developed with Arduino tools or compatible hardware. This directly contradicts the open-source licenses (AGPL/GPLv3) of Arduino's IDE and CLI, which permit reverse engineering, while the new terms forbid it for "the Platform."

The community is seeking clarification on whether "the Platform" includes the essential IDE and CLI or only cloud services, as this ambiguity puts library maintainers and hardware makers at legal risk. Adafruit, a respected voice in open hardware, emphasizes that Qualcomm misunderstands Arduino's true value: it's not merely an IoT hardware company, but the "IBM PC of the maker world"—a vital, open-source standard and ecosystem that underpins millions of projects, libraries, and educational curricula. Applying restrictive enterprise legal frameworks to this "commons" risks destroying its value, stranding decades of accumulated knowledge, and alienating new makers.

While possibly tone-deafness rather than malice, Qualcomm has severely eroded trust. To salvage Arduino's legacy, Qualcomm must explicitly clarify that the IDE, CLI, and core libraries remain under existing open-source licenses, ideally through concrete commitments or by placing them within an independent foundation with community governance. The coming months will determine if Arduino can restore trust and survive as a commons.
chinese_title: Arduino 发布更新条款和条件：不再是开放公共资源
chinese_summary:

社区正在寻求澄清，“该平台”是包括核心IDE和CLI，还是仅指云服务，因为这种模糊性使库维护者和硬件制造商面临法律风险。Adafruit作为开源硬件领域备受尊敬的声音，强调高通误解了Arduino的真正价值：它不仅仅是一家物联网硬件公司，更是“创客世界的IBM PC”——一个重要的开源标准和生态系统，支撑着数百万个项目、库和教育课程。将限制性的企业法律框架应用于这一“公共资源”有可能会破坏其价值，让数十年积累的知识束之高阁，并疏远新的创客。

虽然这可能只是麻木不仁而非恶意，但高通已经严重损害了信任。为了挽救Arduino的遗产，高通必须明确澄清IDE、CLI和核心库仍受现有开源许可证的保护，最好是通过具体的承诺，或者将其置于一个由社区治理的独立基金会之下。未来几个月将决定Arduino能否恢复信任并作为一个公共资源存续下去。

title: Mozilla says it's finally done with Onerep
summary:
Mozilla is finally ending its partnership with Onerep, an identity protection service offered with Firefox, which will officially cease next month. This decision comes sixteen months after Mozilla initially announced it was winding down the collaboration in March 2024.

The original controversy stemmed from a KrebsOnSecurity investigation revealing Onerep's Belarusian founder, Dimitri Shelest, had created dozens of people-search services since 2010, including the active data broker Nuwber, which sells background reports. Shelest acknowledged his ownership in Nuwber, founded around the same time as Onerep in 2015.

Mozilla stated it will discontinue Monitor Plus, the paid service offering Onerep's data broker site scans and automated data removal. The company cited "high standards for vendors" and the "realities of the data broker ecosystem" as challenges in consistently delivering expected value and reliability.

Current Monitor Plus subscribers will retain full access until December 17, 2025, receiving prorated refunds thereafter. Mozilla will continue its free Monitor data breach service, integrated into Firefox, and plans to integrate more privacy and security experiences, including its VPN, for free.

chinese_summary:

最初的争议源于 KrebsOnSecurity 的一项调查，该调查披露 Onerep 的白俄罗斯创始人 Dimitri Shelest 自 2010 年以来创建了数十个个人信息查询服务，其中包括活跃的数据经纪公司 Nuwber，该公司出售背景报告。Shelest 承认他拥有 Nuwber 的所有权，该公司与 Onerep 均成立于 2015 年左右。

现有 Monitor Plus 订阅者将保留完整访问权限直至 2025 年 12 月 17 日，此后将获得按比例退款。Mozilla 将继续提供其免费的 Monitor 数据泄露服务（已集成到 Firefox 中），并计划免费整合更多隐私和安全体验，包括其 VPN。

title: Students fight back over course taught by AI
summary:
Students at Staffordshire University are confronting their lecturers over a coding module largely taught by Artificial Intelligence, leading to feelings of being "robbed of knowledge and enjoyment." James and Owen, among 41 students in a government-funded apprenticeship for digital careers, discovered the course relied heavily on AI-generated slides and voiceovers. They expressed concern over wasting two years on a program delivered "in the cheapest way possible."

Students identified various signs of AI-generated material, including suspicious file names, inconsistent British/American English, generic information, and a course video where the voiceover abruptly changed to a Spanish accent. AI detectors later confirmed a high likelihood of AI generation in course materials. Students highlighted the hypocrisy of being taught by AI while the university's policies strictly prohibit students from submitting AI-generated work, threatening academic misconduct.

Despite multiple confrontations with lecturers and officials, the university initially responded that teachers are allowed to use various tools. Subsequently, a policy statement appeared on the course website, seemingly justifying AI use for "academic professionals." While the university maintained "academic standards and learning outcomes were maintained" and brought in human lecturers for the final session, students felt it was too little, too late.

This incident reflects a growing trend of universities using AI in teaching, which, despite being lauded by some education policies, is proving demoralizing for students who feel their time is wasted on superficial learning, rather than gaining the in-depth knowledge they sought.

学生们发现了人工智能生成材料的各种迹象，包括可疑的文件名、不一致的英式/美式英语、通用信息，以及一个课程视频中画外音突然变成了西班牙口音。人工智能检测器后来证实，课程材料极有可能由人工智能生成。学生们强调了这种虚伪性：他们被人工智能教授，而大学政策却严禁学生提交人工智能生成作品，并威胁将处以学术不端行为的惩罚。

这一事件反映了大学在教学中使用人工智能的日益增长的趋势，尽管受到一些教育政策的称赞，但这却让学生感到士气低落，他们觉得时间浪费在肤浅的学习上，而不是获得他们所寻求的深入知识。

title: Measuring political bias in Claude
summary:
Anthropic's "Measuring political bias in Claude" outlines their commitment to training Claude for political even-handedness, ensuring it treats opposing viewpoints with equal depth, engagement, and analytical quality. Their goal is for Claude to be seen as fair and trustworthy across the political spectrum.

They employ "character training" using reinforcement learning and system prompts to instill traits like objectivity, balanced discussion, and a refusal to influence users' political decisions. Ideal behaviors include avoiding unsolicited opinions, maintaining factual accuracy, representing multiple perspectives respectfully, and using neutral language.

To measure this, Anthropic developed an automated "Paired Prompts" evaluation. This method presents AI models with requests on the same contentious topic from two opposing ideological viewpoints. Responses are then graded by Claude Sonnet 4.5 (with cross-checks from other models) on three criteria:
1.  **Even-handedness:** Similar depth, engagement, and evidence for both sides.
2.  **Opposing perspectives:** Acknowledging counterarguments.
3.  **Refusals:** Willingness to engage with the prompt.

Results showed Claude Sonnet 4.5 (94%) and Opus 4.1 (95%) performed comparably to Gemini 2.5 Pro (97%) and Grok 4 (96%) in even-handedness, outperforming GPT-5 (89%) and Llama 4 (66%). Claude models also maintained low refusal rates. Anthropic open-sourced this evaluation to benefit the broader AI industry. The study acknowledges limitations, such as its focus on US political discourse and single-turn interactions.
chinese_title: 衡量Claude中的政治偏见
chinese_summary:
Anthropic的《衡量Claude政治偏见》阐述了他们致力于将Claude训练成政治上不偏不倚的承诺，确保它以同等的深度、参与度和分析质量对待对立观点。他们的目标是让Claude在整个政治光谱中被视为公平和值得信赖。

他们采用“品格训练”，利用强化学习和系统提示，灌输客观性、平衡讨论以及拒绝影响用户政治决策等特质。理想行为包括避免提供不请自来的观点、保持事实准确性、尊重地呈现多方观点以及使用中立语言。

为了衡量这一点，Anthropic开发了一种自动化的“配对提示”评估方法。该方法向AI模型呈现同一争议话题下来自两种对立意识形态视角的请求。然后由Claude Sonnet 4.5（并辅以其他模型的交叉检查）根据三个标准对响应进行评分：
1.  **不偏不倚性：** 对双方提供相似的深度、参与度和证据。
2.  **对立观点：** 承认反驳论点。
3.  **拒绝率：** 参与提示的意愿。

结果显示，Claude Sonnet 4.5（94%）和Opus 4.1（95%）在不偏不倚性方面与Gemini 2.5 Pro（97%）和Grok 4（96%）表现相当，优于GPT-5（89%）和Llama 4（66%）。Claude模型也保持了较低的拒绝率。Anthropic开源了这项评估，以造福更广泛的AI行业。该研究承认其局限性，例如其侧重于美国政治话语和单轮互动。

title: We should all be using dependency cooldowns
summary:
The article champions "dependency cooldowns" as a free, easy, and highly effective method to combat open source supply chain attacks. The author argues that despite vendor hype, most supply chain attacks share a common structure: an attacker compromises a project and introduces malicious code, but their "window of opportunity" for impact is typically very short—often hours to a few days—before security vendors detect and report the compromise, leading to package removal.

Analyzing prominent attacks like Ultralytics, tj-actions, and Nx, the article highlights that 8 out of 10 recent incidents had an exploitation window of less than a week. A "cooldown" is a waiting period (e.g., 7 days) between a dependency's publication and its allowed use. This window allows security tools and vendors to identify and address malicious packages before they are automatically adopted by users.

Cooldowns are lauded for their empirical effectiveness in mitigating the majority of high-visibility attacks, their ease of implementation (often free via tools like Dependabot or Renovate), and their positive impact on vendor behavior. A 7-day cooldown, for instance, could prevent 80% of listed attacks from reaching end-users. While not a complete solution, an 80-90% reduction in exposure for free is a significant gain. The article encourages wider adoption by projects and calls for packaging ecosystems to integrate first-class cooldown support directly into package managers.
chinese_title: 我们都应该使用依赖冷却期。
chinese_summary:
本文倡导将“依赖冷却期”作为一种免费、简便且高效的方法来对抗开源供应链攻击。作者指出，尽管有厂商宣传，但大多数供应链攻击都具有共同的结构：攻击者攻陷一个项目并植入恶意代码，但其造成影响的“攻击窗口期”通常非常短——往往只有几小时到几天——在此期间，安全厂商便会检测并报告此入侵情况，从而导致软件包被移除。

文章分析了Ultralytics、tj-actions和Nx等知名攻击事件，指出近10起事件中有8起的利用窗口期不足一周。“冷却期”是指一个依赖项发布后到其允许使用之间的等待时间（例如7天）。这个窗口期让安全工具和厂商有机会在恶意软件包被用户自动采纳之前，识别并处理它们。

冷却期因其在缓解大多数高关注度攻击方面的实践有效性、易于实施（通常可通过Dependabot或Renovate等工具免费实现）以及对厂商行为的积极影响而备受赞扬。例如，一个7天的冷却期可以阻止80%已列出的攻击触达最终用户。虽然这并非一个彻底的解决方案，但免费实现80-90%的风险暴露降低，无疑是一项重大收益。文章鼓励各项目更广泛地采纳这一机制，并呼吁包管理生态系统将原生冷却期支持直接整合到包管理器中。

title: You can make PS2 games in JavaScript
summary:
You can now make PS2 games in JavaScript, thanks to the release of a new JavaScript SDK for the "PlayStation 2 Online" platform. This innovative tool empowers web developers to create and publish games that can be played directly on a modified PlayStation 2 console, bypassing traditional emulation.

The SDK, known as `ps2-online-sdk`, leverages a modified PS2 emulator to allow local development and testing in a browser environment. It provides JavaScript APIs to interact with the console's hardware features, including controllers, graphics, audio, and even network functionality. Developers can use their existing web development skills to build games, complete with 3D graphics rendered using WebGL, WebGPU, or other browser-based rendering techniques.

A key feature is the ability to deploy games to a physical PS2. By transferring the game's compiled JavaScript and assets to a USB drive or network share, users can launch them on a PS2 running custom firmware. The platform envisions a community-driven ecosystem where developers can share their creations, potentially leading to new online multiplayer experiences for the classic console. This initiative redefines game development for the PS2, making it accessible to a broader audience of JavaScript developers.
chinese_title: 你可以用 JavaScript 开发 PS2 游戏
chinese_summary:
得益于“PlayStation 2 Online”平台发布了一个新的JavaScript SDK，现在可以用JavaScript制作PS2游戏了。这一创新工具赋能Web开发者，让他们能够创建和发布可直接在修改过的PlayStation 2主机上运行的游戏，从而绕过了传统的模拟器。

这个名为`ps2-online-sdk`的SDK，利用一个修改过的PS2模拟器，允许开发者在浏览器环境中进行本地开发和测试。它提供了JavaScript API，用于与主机的硬件功能进行交互，包括控制器、图形、音频，甚至网络功能。开发者可以使用他们现有的Web开发技能来构建游戏，包括使用WebGL、WebGPU或其他基于浏览器的渲染技术呈现的3D图形。

一个关键功能是能够将游戏部署到一台物理PS2主机上。通过将游戏的编译后的JavaScript代码和资产传输到USB驱动器或网络共享中，用户可以在运行自定义固件的PS2上启动这些游戏。该平台设想了一个社区驱动的生态系统，开发者可以在其中分享他们的作品，这有望为这款经典主机带来全新的在线多人游戏体验。这一举措重新定义了PS2的游戏开发，使其可供更广泛的JavaScript开发者群体使用。

title: Dr Matthew Garrett v Dr Roy Schestowitz and Anor
summary:
Mrs Justice Collins Rice is presiding over a dispute between prominent 'free software movement' activists: Dr Matthew Garrett (Claimant) and Dr Roy Schestowitz and Mrs Rianne Schestowitz (Defendants).

Dr Garrett, a senior software engineer at NVIDIA and Berkeley lecturer, claims libel over 24 publications on the Schestowitzes' websites (Techrights and Tuxmachines) and a further data protection claim, stemming from August/September 2023. The defendants, who operate non-profit free software sites, counterclaim for harassment. Their defence against libel includes arguing no serious harm, truth, honest opinion, and public interest, while for data protection, they cite journalistic purposes.

A critical procedural issue emerged when the defendants, acting in person, failed to provide witness statements by court deadlines. This led to an order from Griffiths J prohibiting them from calling any witnesses at trial. Dr Schestowitz confirmed this was a deliberate financial decision, understanding it would limit their ability to introduce evidence for their defence and counterclaim.

Mrs Justice Collins Rice's preliminary task involved determining the "single natural and ordinary meaning," distinguishing fact from opinion, and assessing the defamatory tendency of each publication. She noted common themes: Dr Garrett was accused of waging an online campaign of criminal (cybercrime, hate crime, blackmail, threats), illegal (defamation, harassment), and offensive (racist, antisemitic, misogynist, etc.) material via IRC 'sockpuppet' accounts. Crucially, he was also repeatedly alleged to be an uncontrolled user of illegal Class A drugs, specifically crack cocaine.

The judge determined that allegations of criminal or illegal acts were factual (Chase level 1), while offensive attitudinal matters were expressions of opinion. She concluded that all publications were of "grossly defamatory tendency."
chinese_title: 马修·加勒特博士 诉 罗伊·舍斯托维茨博士 及另案当事人
chinese_summary:
柯林斯·赖斯法官正在审理一场备受关注的“自由软件运动”活动家之间的纠纷：原告马修·加勒特博士与被告罗伊·谢斯托维茨博士和里安妮·谢斯托维茨夫人。

加勒特博士是英伟达（NVIDIA）的高级软件工程师和伯克利大学的讲师，他指控谢斯托维茨夫妇网站（Techrights和Tuxmachines）上的24篇出版物构成诽谤，并提出一项额外的数据保护索赔，这些索赔源于2023年8月/9月。被告经营非营利性自由软件网站，他们反诉原告骚扰。他们针对诽谤的辩护包括主张未造成严重损害、事实、诚实意见和公共利益，而对于数据保护，他们则援引新闻目的。

当被告亲自出庭，未能按法院规定期限提交证人陈述时，出现了一个关键的程序问题。这导致格里菲斯法官下令禁止他们在审判中传唤任何证人。谢斯托维茨博士证实这是一个蓄意的财务决定，他明白这将限制他们为辩护和反诉引入证据的能力。

柯林斯·赖斯法官的初步任务包括确定“单一自然和普通含义”，区分事实与意见，并评估每篇出版物的诽谤倾向。她指出了一些共同主题：加勒特博士被指控通过IRC“马甲”账户进行线上活动，发布犯罪（网络犯罪、仇恨犯罪、勒索、威胁）、非法（诽谤、骚扰）和冒犯性（种族主义、反犹太主义、厌女等）内容。至关重要的是，他还被反复指控是失控的非法A类毒品（特别是可卡因）使用者。

法官裁定，关于犯罪或非法行为的指控属于事实（切斯原则一级），而冒犯性态度问题则属于意见表达。她总结说，所有出版物都具有“严重诽谤倾向”。

title: Making a Small RPG
summary:
In "Making a Small RPG," the author shares insights into developing a concise role-playing game within a limited scope, specifically for game jams. The core philosophy emphasizes starting small, focusing on one central idea or mechanic, and completing it.

The article breaks down the process into several key areas:

1.  **Scope and Core Idea:** Begin with a single, compelling idea, like a unique combat system, movement mechanic, or narrative theme. This prevents feature creep and ensures focus.
2.  **Tools:** The author recommends user-friendly tools that speed up development. For graphics, Aseprite (pixel art) or MagicaVoxel (voxel art) are suggested. Godot Engine is highlighted for its versatility, ease of use for 2D, and active community, making it suitable for quick prototyping.
3.  **Art Style:** Simplicity is key. A pixel art style or even placeholder graphics can work wonders, allowing developers to prioritize gameplay over extensive visual fidelity.
4.  **Audio:** While sound adds polish, it's often the last priority for small projects. Free resources or simple sound effects are acceptable.
5.  **Marketing & Showcase:** Even for small games, sharing development progress and the final product on platforms like itch.io is encouraged for feedback and community engagement.

The article's overarching message is to embrace limitations, prioritize completion over perfection, and learn through iterative development, making small RPGs a great entry point into game development.
chinese_title: 小型RPG制作
chinese_summary:
在《制作小型RPG》一文中，作者分享了在有限范围内（特别是针对游戏果酱）开发简洁角色扮演游戏的见解。其核心理念强调从小处着手，专注于一个核心创意或机制，并将其完成。

文章将该过程分解为几个关键领域：

1.  **范围与核心创意：** 从一个单一的、引人注目的创意开始，例如独特的战斗系统、移动机制或叙事主题。这可以防止功能蔓延并确保专注。
2.  **工具：** 作者推荐了能加快开发进程的用户友好工具。对于图形方面，建议使用Aseprite（像素艺术）或MagicaVoxel（体素艺术）。Godot引擎因其多功能性、易于2D使用以及活跃的社区而受到强调，使其适合快速原型开发。
3.  **美术风格：** 简洁是关键。像素艺术风格甚至占位符图形都能发挥巨大作用，使得开发者能够将游戏玩法置于广泛的视觉保真度之上。
4.  **音频：** 尽管声音能增加完善度，但对于小型项目而言，它通常是最后一个优先级。免费资源或简单的音效是可以接受的。
5.  **营销与展示：** 即使是小型游戏，也鼓励在itch.io等平台上分享开发进度和最终产品，以获取反馈和社区参与。

文章的总体信息是拥抱限制，将完成度置于完美之上，并通过迭代开发进行学习，这使得小型RPG成为进入游戏开发的绝佳切入点。

title: RFK Jr.'s loathesome edits: CDC website now falsely links vaccines and autism
summary:
Under Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s leadership as the country’s top health official, the CDC’s "Autism and Vaccines" webpage was abruptly replaced. The previous page accurately stated that studies show no link between vaccines and autism. The new version, however, promotes the false claim that "studies have not ruled out the possibility that infant vaccines cause autism," described by critics as an "anti-vaccine screed."

The updated page cherry-picks fringe studies, misrepresents federal reviews, and targets aluminum adjuvants even when irrelevant (e.g., to the MMR vaccine). It cites a two-decade-old survey of 77 parents and dismisses a recent high-quality study of 1.2 million children that found no link between vaccine aluminum and autism, a study Kennedy previously demanded be retracted.

HHS claimed the updates reflect "gold standard, evidence-based science," but anonymous agency officials stated career CDC scientists were not consulted. Medical and health experts expressed "dismay, anger, and disbelief." Dr. Susan Kressly, President of the American Academy of Pediatrics, blasted the changes, calling the link "false" and citing over 40 high-quality studies conclusively refuting any connection. She urged the CDC to stop spreading "harmful myths" that undermine public trust and threaten vaccination rates, which could lead to increased disease and suffering.
chinese_title: 小肯尼迪的卑劣修改：疾控中心网站现虚假关联疫苗与自闭症
chinese_summary:

更新后的页面挑选边缘研究，歪曲联邦审查结果，甚至在不相关的情况下也针对铝佐剂（例如，与麻腮风疫苗无关）。它引用了一项针对77名父母的20年前的调查，却驳斥了一项近期针对120万儿童的高质量研究，该研究发现疫苗中的铝与自闭症之间没有关联。肯尼迪此前曾要求撤回这项研究。

卫生与公众服务部（HHS）声称这些更新反映了“金标准、循证科学”，但匿名的机构官员表示，疾控中心的职业科学家并未被征求意见。医学和健康专家对此表达了“沮丧、愤怒和难以置信”。美国儿科学会主席苏珊·克雷斯利博士猛烈抨击了这些修改，称这种关联是“虚假的”，并引用了超过40项高质量研究，这些研究明确驳斥了任何关联。她敦促疾控中心停止散布损害公众信任并威胁疫苗接种率的“有害神话”，因为这可能导致疾病增加和痛苦。

title: Gmail can read your emails and attachments to train its AI, unless you opt out
summary:
Google is reportedly rolling out a change that automatically opts Gmail users in to allow their private emails and attachments to be used for training its AI models, such as Gemini, Smart Compose, and AI-generated replies. This is intended to power new Gmail features, making the service smarter and more personalized.

The concern is that these settings are being enabled by default without explicit user consent, meaning private messages could be analyzed for AI training in the background. While Google promises strong privacy measures like anonymization, using sensitive information for AI training raises significant privacy red flags for many, despite the potential benefits of improved AI assistance.

To regain control and fully opt out, users must manually change settings in two separate locations:

1.  **Turn off "Smart Features in Gmail, Chat, and Meet":**
    *   Go to Gmail Settings (gear icon > See all settings or Menu > Settings).
    *   Find "Smart Features in Gmail, Chat, and Meet" and uncheck it.
    *   Save changes.

2.  **Turn off "Google Workspace Smart Features":**
    *   Still in Settings, locate "Google Workspace smart features."
    *   Click "Manage Workspace smart feature settings."
    *   Toggle off both "Smart features in Google Workspace" and "Smart features in other Google products."
    *   Save again.

After completing both steps, verify that the toggles remain off and refresh Gmail. Google separates these settings to cover features within Workspace apps and those extended to other Google products. The rollout is gradual, so not all accounts may have these enabled by default yet, but users concerned about privacy are advised to check their settings immediately.

1.  **关闭“Gmail、Chat 和 Meet 中的智能功能”：**
    *   前往 Gmail 设置（齿轮图标 > 查看所有设置 或 菜单 > 设置）。

    *   再次保存。

完成以上两个步骤后，请确认这些开关保持关闭状态，并刷新Gmail。谷歌将这些设置分开是为了覆盖Workspace应用内部的功能以及延伸到其他Google产品中的功能。此项推出是逐步进行的，因此并非所有账户都已默认启用这些功能，但建议关注隐私的用户立即检查其设置。

title: DOS Days – Laptop Displays
summary:
The article "DOS Days – Laptop Displays" traces the evolution of laptop screens during the DOS era, highlighting the rapid technological advancements that transformed these crucial components.

Initially, early DOS laptops primarily featured monochrome Liquid Crystal Displays (LCDs), often transflective, capable of emulating CGA, Hercules, or EGA graphics in a single color, usually grey on grey, green on black, or blue on white. Resolutions were low, typically 640x200 or 640x480.

The progression moved to greyscale displays, offering more shades for better graphical representation, still predominantly passive matrix. The first attempts at color arrived with passive-matrix Super-Twist Nematic (STN) and later Dual Super-Twist Nematic (DSTN) displays. While offering color, these suffered from significant drawbacks: slow refresh rates, resulting in "ghosting" or "submarining" cursors, narrow viewing angles, and muted, washed-out colors. These limitations often made them unsuitable for fast-moving graphics or detailed work.

The major breakthrough came with Thin Film Transistor (TFT) active-matrix displays. TFT technology revolutionized laptop screens by providing each pixel with its own transistor, leading to significantly brighter, sharper images, much wider viewing angles, faster response times, and vibrant, true colors. This innovation made graphical user interfaces like Windows practical on laptops and paved the way for modern multimedia experiences, moving far beyond the text-centric world of DOS. The article concludes by emphasizing how these display advancements were fundamental to the laptop's transition from a niche business tool to a versatile personal computer.
chinese_title: DOS时代 - 笔记本显示屏
chinese_summary:
文章《DOS时代——笔记本电脑显示器》追溯了DOS时代笔记本电脑屏幕的演变，突出了改变这些关键组件的快速技术进步。

最初，早期的DOS笔记本电脑主要采用单色液晶显示器（LCD），通常是半透射式，能够以单一颜色模拟CGA、Hercules或EGA图形，通常是灰底灰字、黑底绿字或白底蓝字。分辨率很低，通常为640x200或640x480。

随后发展到灰度显示器，提供更多色阶以获得更好的图形表现力，但仍以无源矩阵为主。最初的彩色尝试是采用无源矩阵的超扭曲向列（STN）显示器，随后是双层超扭曲向列（DSTN）显示器。尽管提供了彩色显示，但这些显示器存在明显的缺点：刷新率慢，导致光标出现“残影”或“潜水艇效应”；视角窄；颜色暗淡、褪色。这些限制常常使它们不适合显示快速移动的图形或进行精细工作。

真正的突破出现在薄膜晶体管（TFT）有源矩阵显示器。TFT技术通过为每个像素配备独立的晶体管，彻底改变了笔记本电脑屏幕，从而带来更明亮、更清晰的图像，更宽的视角，更快的响应时间以及鲜艳、真实的色彩。这一创新使Windows等图形用户界面在笔记本电脑上变得实用，并为现代多媒体体验铺平了道路，使其远远超越了以文本为中心的DOS世界。文章最后强调，这些显示技术进步对于笔记本电脑从小众商务工具向多功能个人电脑的转型至关重要。

title: Prozac 'no better than placebo' for treating children with depression, experts
summary:
A new meta-analysis suggests that fluoxetine, commonly known as Prozac, offers no clinically meaningful benefit over a placebo for treating depression in children and adolescents. Academics from Austria and the UK reviewed 12 large trials from 1997 to 2024, concluding that any improvement in depressive symptoms was too small to be significant.

The study argues that current clinical guidelines in the UK, US, and Canada, which recommend antidepressants for young people, should be revised. Authors highlight that exposing children to known side effects – including weight gain, sleep disturbance, concentration problems, and increased suicidal ideation – is unjustifiable when the drug has no advantage over placebo. They also noted a "novelty bias" in earlier trials, which were more positive.

The researchers urge clinicians to prioritize understanding and addressing the underlying causes of depression, rather than prescribing medication with negligible benefit and poorly understood long-term effects.

The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) stated that psychological therapies remain the first-line treatment, with antidepressants considered for moderate to severe cases only under specialist supervision. The Royal College of Psychiatrists, however, advised "caution" in interpreting the findings, noting that guidelines weigh various factors beyond just average effect size, such as safety and patient preferences.
chinese_title: 专家：百忧解治疗儿童抑郁症“不优于安慰剂”
chinese_summary:
新的一项荟萃分析表明，氟西汀（俗称百忧解）在治疗儿童和青少年抑郁症方面，相比安慰剂没有临床意义上的益处。来自奥地利和英国的学者审查了1997年至2024年间的12项大型试验，得出的结论是抑郁症状的任何改善都太小，不具有显著性。

该研究认为，目前英国、美国和加拿大建议青少年使用抗抑郁药的临床指南应该修订。作者们强调，当药物对安慰剂没有优势时，让儿童暴露于已知的副作用（包括体重增加、睡眠障碍、注意力不集中和自杀意念增加）是站不住脚的。他们还指出，早期试验存在“新奇偏误”，那些试验的结果更为积极。

研究人员敦促临床医生优先理解和解决抑郁症的根本原因，而不是开出益处微乎其微且长期影响知之甚少的药物。

英国国家健康与护理卓越研究院（NICE）指出，心理疗法仍是一线治疗，抗抑郁药仅在专科医生监督下用于中度至重度病例。然而，英国皇家精神病医师学院建议对研究结果的解读保持“谨慎”，指出指南在考虑平均效应量之外，还会权衡安全性和患者偏好等多种因素。

title: GitHut – Programming Languages and GitHub (2014)
summary:
GitHut is a 2014 project by Carlo Zapponi designed to visualize and explore the programming languages used across repositories hosted on GitHub, the world's largest code host. The initiative aims to understand language popularity among developers, discover unique language characteristics, and observe the human quest for better problem-solving tools and collaboration.

The quantitative data for GitHut is collected from GitHub's publicly available API, specifically aggregated and stored by GitHub Archive, which is also accessible via Google BigQuery. This data is updated quarterly. A crucial methodological choice was to use "Activity" (number of changes pushed) as the primary metric for language popularity, rather than newly created repositories. This decision was made because many new repositories do not specify a programming language, making "Activity" a more reliable indicator. Programming language release years are sourced from Wikipedia.

GitHut provides views such as "top active languages" and allows users to explore data by total amount or percentage. The work is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA License.

title: Details about the shebang/hash-bang mechanism on various Unix flavours (2001)
summary:
The shebang (`#!`) mechanism, originating from Bell Labs (Dennis Ritchie) between Research Unix V7 and V8, was first widely implemented in 4.0BSD (1980) and by default in 4.2BSD (1983). Initially, it had strict line length limits (16-32 bytes) and didn't pass arguments.

Over time, `#!` evolved to pass arguments as a single string (Linux) or in a split fashion, though the myth of a *required* blank after `#!` (e.g., in early autoconf docs) is largely unfounded. Setuid support for scripts was often disabled due to security concerns (race conditions), but modern systems like Solaris, Irix, UnixWare, NetBSD, OpenBSD, and MacOS X 10.5+ support it by using virtual filedescriptors (`/dev/fd/n`) to mitigate risks.

Nesting `#!` scripts (where the interpreter itself is a script) is generally unsupported, but Linux (since 2.6.27.9) allows up to four levels, and Minix also accepts it. The `env` utility (`#!/usr/bin/env`) enhances script portability by finding interpreters in `PATH`, though `env`'s own location (`/usr/bin/env` vs. `/bin/env`) can still vary.

Maximum line lengths for `#!` increased significantly from the original 16-32 bytes to 127 bytes on Linux, typically `_POSIX_PATH_MAX` (255) or `PATH_MAX` (1024) on many other systems, and `PAGE_SIZE` (e.g., 4096-8192 bytes) on FreeBSD since 6.0. FreeBSD 4.0 briefly introduced comment-like handling of `#` in arguments, which was later revoked, while MacOS X 10.3 adopted it. The article also corrects historical inaccuracies found in the Unix FAQ.
chinese_title: 各种 Unix 版本 shebang/hash-bang 机制详解 (2001)
chinese_summary:
shebang（`#!`）机制起源于贝尔实验室（丹尼斯·里奇）在 Research Unix V7 和 V8 之间，首次在 4.0BSD (1980) 中得到广泛实现，并从 4.2BSD (1983) 开始成为默认功能。最初，它有严格的行长度限制（16-32字节），且不传递参数。

随着时间的推移，`#!` 演变为将参数作为单个字符串（Linux）或以拆分方式传递，尽管关于 `#!` 之后必须有空格的说法（例如在早期的 autoconf 文档中）在很大程度上是毫无根据的。由于安全问题（竞争条件），脚本的 Setuid 支持常常被禁用，但现代系统如 Solaris、Irix、UnixWare、NetBSD、OpenBSD 和 MacOS X 10.5+ 通过使用虚拟文件描述符（`/dev/fd/n`）来缓解风险并支持此功能。

嵌套 `#!` 脚本（即解释器本身也是一个脚本）通常不被支持，但 Linux（自 2.6.27.9 起）允许最多四层嵌套，Minix 也支持此功能。`env` 工具（`#!/usr/bin/env`）通过在 `PATH` 中查找解释器来增强脚本的可移植性，尽管 `env` 本身的路径（`/usr/bin/env` 与 `/bin/env`）仍可能有所不同。

`#!` 的最大行长度从最初的 16-32 字节显著增加，在 Linux 上达到 127 字节，在许多其他系统上通常是 `_POSIX_PATH_MAX` (255) 或 `PATH_MAX` (1024)，在 FreeBSD 6.0 及更高版本上则是 `PAGE_SIZE`（例如 4096-8192 字节）。FreeBSD 4.0 曾短暂引入对参数中 `#` 的注释式处理，但后来被撤销，而 MacOS X 10.3 则采用了此功能。本文还纠正了 Unix FAQ 中发现的历史不准确之处。

title: XBMC 4.0 for the Original Xbox
summary:
XBMC 4.0 has been released for the Original Xbox, marking the first major update since 2016 and a significant effort to modernize and preserve this iconic homebrew application. Originating as XboxMediaPlayer in 2002, XBMC eventually split into XBMC4Xbox and Kodi, and even influenced Plex, shaping the landscape of media center software.

This new version revitalizes the platform with several key advancements. Most notably, it introduces the Estuary user interface, a modern skin adapted from Kodi v17, powered by a ported GUIlib engine. This brings a contemporary, intuitive look and improved navigation to the legacy console while maintaining performance.

XBMC 4.0 significantly expands games library support, offering rich metadata, artwork, and descriptions for both Xbox and emulated titles, akin to its movie and music sections. Online metadata scrapers for movies and TV are fully restored, enabling comprehensive media organization. The update also includes improved task scheduling for concurrent activities like background library updates, enhanced music playback with FLAC support and visualizers, and an online add-on repository.

The project features Python-based add-ons (with future Python 3.4.10 support planned for broader compatibility) and revised settings for playback, network services (including Insignia-compatible DNS), and system tools. This open-source release aims to keep the Original Xbox relevant and useful, demonstrating its enduring potential through active development. XBMC 4.0 is distinct from The Kodi Foundation.
chinese_title: 初代 Xbox 上的 XBMC 4.0
chinese_summary:

XBMC 4.0 显著扩展了游戏库支持，为 Xbox 游戏和模拟器游戏提供了丰富的元数据、封面图和描述，类似于其电影和音乐部分。针对电影和电视的在线元数据抓取器已完全恢复，从而实现了全面的媒体整理。此次更新还包括改进的任务调度功能，用于处理后台库更新等并发活动；增强的音乐播放功能，支持 FLAC 格式和可视化效果；以及一个在线插件库。

title: OOP is shifting between domains, not disappearing
summary:
The article posits that Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is not disappearing but rather shifting its fundamental principles to new domains, a trend the author views negatively. Historically, OOP evolved to manage complexity in software development by enforcing separation and limiting information flow between components through concepts like interfaces, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.

However, the author contends that this internal, language-enforced separation has been replaced by external process and network boundaries. Driven by a pervasive lack of trust among developers and between independently operating programs, modern systems have erected "highest and thickest walls" in the form of microservices, Docker, and Kubernetes.

The author argues that this contemporary distributed architecture, despite its promises of "scaling," merely replicates OOP's flaws on a grander scale, magnifying them tenfold. Analogies are drawn, such as OpenAPI schemas replacing type-checkers and Kubernetes replacing event loops. Every interaction across these components incurs significant overhead, including new failure modes, serialization costs, kernel scheduling, and network latency. The article concludes that while not fully convinced by OOP, the author finds its distributed systems replacement to be an even more complex, inefficient, and problematic paradigm.
chinese_title: OOP 正在跨领域转移，而非消失。
chinese_summary:
文章认为，面向对象编程（OOP）并未消失，而是将其基本原则转移到了新的领域，作者对此趋势持负面看法。从历史上看，OOP的演变是为了通过接口、封装、继承和多态等概念，强制实现组件间的分离并限制信息流，从而管理软件开发中的复杂性。

然而，作者认为，这种内部的、由语言强制实现的分离已经被外部进程和网络边界所取代。在开发者之间以及独立运行的程序之间普遍存在的不信任感的驱动下，现代系统以微服务、Docker和Kubernetes的形式，竖起了“最高最厚的墙”。

作者认为，这种当代的分布式架构，尽管承诺“可扩展性”，但它只是在更大规模上复制了OOP的缺陷，并将其放大了十倍。文章中进行了类比，例如OpenAPI schema取代了类型检查器，Kubernetes取代了事件循环。这些组件间的每次交互都会产生显著的开销，包括新的故障模式、序列化成本、内核调度和网络延迟。文章总结道，尽管作者并未完全信服OOP，但他认为其分布式系统替代方案是一个更加复杂、低效且充满问题的范式。

title: Racing karts on a Rust GPU kernel driver
summary:
Collabora has announced a significant milestone for Tyr, their Rust driver for Arm Mali GPUs: the prototype can now run a full desktop environment (GNOME, Weston) and demanding 3D games like SuperTuxKart, matching the performance of C-based drivers.

The article details the progression of Tyr, explaining the crucial role of the kernel-mode driver (KMD) in hardware initialization, memory management, and job scheduling, contrasting it with the user-mode driver's API translation. Initially, development focused on fundamental KMD operations and submitting simple GPU jobs. Subsequent achievements included rendering a rotating cube (kmscube) at display refresh rates and then at over 500 frames per second, demonstrating robust job submission and synchronization.

The project then scaled up, successfully running Weston and GNOME, allowing users to log in, browse the web, and watch videos. The ultimate test involved running a full-screen 3D game, SuperTuxKart, which performed flawlessly without noticeable hiccups, showcasing the KMD's capability under demanding workloads.

While Tyr remains a prototype not yet ready for daily use or upstream integration, it serves as a vital experimental platform and testbed for Rust abstractions in GPU drivers. It definitively proves that Rust GPU KMDs are viable and can deliver performance on par with their C counterparts. Currently, the prototype is limited to the Rock 5B board (Rockchip RK3588), with Collabora encouraging testing and feedback from the community.
chinese_title: 在 Rust GPU 内核驱动上跑卡丁车
chinese_summary:
Collabora 宣布 Tyr（他们为 Arm Mali GPU 开发的 Rust 驱动程序）取得了重要里程碑：该原型现在可以运行完整的桌面环境（GNOME, Weston）以及像 SuperTuxKart 这样的高要求 3D 游戏，性能与基于 C 语言的驱动程序相当。

文章详细介绍了 Tyr 的进展，解释了内核模式驱动程序（KMD）在硬件初始化、内存管理和作业调度中的关键作用，并将其与用户模式驱动程序的 API 转换进行了对比。最初，开发工作侧重于基本的 KMD 操作和提交简单的 GPU 作业。随后的成就包括以显示器刷新率渲染旋转立方体 (kmscube)，然后达到每秒超过 500 帧的速度，这展示了强大的作业提交和同步能力。

随后，该项目进行了扩展，成功运行了 Weston 和 GNOME，用户可以登录、浏览网页和观看视频。最终测试是在全屏模式下运行 3D 游戏 SuperTuxKart，游戏运行流畅，没有任何明显卡顿，展示了 KMD 在高负载工作下的强大能力。

尽管 Tyr 仍是一个原型，尚未准备好用于日常使用或上游集成，但它为 GPU 驱动程序中 Rust 抽象的应用提供了一个重要的实验平台和测试平台。它明确证明了 Rust GPU KMD 是可行的，并且可以提供与 C 语言对应产品相当的性能。目前，该原型仅限于 Rock 5B 开发板（瑞芯微 RK3588），Collabora 鼓励社区进行测试并提供反馈。

title: EXIF orientation info in PNGs isn't used for image-orientation: from-image
summary:
This bug report, titled "EXIF orientation info in PNGs isn't used for image-orientation: from-image," describes an issue where Firefox (and Chrome) fail to apply EXIF orientation data embedded in PNG images, even when the `image-orientation: from-image` CSS property is specified.

The reporter, Eric Portis, demonstrated that a JPEG and a PNG with identical EXIF "Rotate 90 CW" orientation info displayed differently, with only the JPEG correctly rotated. This behavior was observed across multiple browsers. Safari was noted to partially respect EXIF orientation in PNGs if the data appeared before the image data, but Firefox and Chrome did not.

Commenters confirmed that the PNG specification (PNG-3) defines an `eXIf` chunk for this purpose. The initial patches for related image loading work did not cover this, but it was noted that adding support wouldn't be too difficult if the `eXIf` chunk appeared early in the file.

The bug was categorized as a defect, impacting web compatibility due to differing platform behavior (parity-chrome, parity-safari). After about five years, the bug was marked as RESOLVED DUPLICATE of bug 1682759, indicating that the fix or resolution for this issue is tracked under that other bug.
chinese_title: PNG中的EXIF方向信息不用于“图像方向：来自图像”。
chinese_summary:
这份题为“PNG图片中的EXIF方向信息未用于`image-orientation: from-image`”的bug报告，描述了一个问题：Firefox（和Chrome）未能应用嵌入在PNG图片中的EXIF方向数据，即使指定了`image-orientation: from-image`这一CSS属性。

报告者Eric Portis演示了具有相同EXIF“顺时针旋转90度”方向信息的JPEG和PNG图片显示不同，只有JPEG图片被正确旋转。这一行为在多个浏览器中被观察到。据指出，Safari在PNG图片中如果EXIF数据出现在图片数据之前，则会部分遵循EXIF方向信息，但Firefox和Chrome则不然。

评论者证实，PNG规范（PNG-3）为此定义了一个`eXIf`块。相关的图片加载工作的初始补丁并未涵盖这一点，但据指出，如果`eXIf`块在文件早期出现，添加支持将不会太困难。

该bug被归类为缺陷，由于不同平台行为（与Chrome、Safari的兼容性问题）而影响网络兼容性。大约五年后，该bug被标记为bug 1682759的“已解决重复”，表明此问题的修复或解决方案在该其他bug下进行跟踪。

title: Homeschooling hits record numbers
summary:
Homeschooling is experiencing unprecedented growth in the U.S., becoming an increasingly mainstream educational choice. The initial surge, fueled by COVID-19 pandemic closures and dissatisfaction with remote learning, has not subsided; instead, it indicates a fundamental and resilient shift in how American families approach education.

Angela Watson of Johns Hopkins University reports an average homeschooling growth rate of 5.4% for 2024-2025, nearly triple the pre-pandemic rate of 2%. Over a third of reporting states have reached their highest-ever homeschooling numbers, surpassing even pandemic peaks. While a brief post-pandemic dip occurred, growth rebounded sharply in 2023-2024 and continues, with some states seeing over 20% increases. The total homeschooling population is now estimated at about 6% of students nationwide, up from 3% pre-pandemic, with these figures likely underestimating the true numbers.

This trend is part of a broader exodus from traditional public schools towards non-public alternatives. Studies by Boston University and the Brookings Institution confirm significant declines in public school enrollment nationally, projecting potential losses of up to 8.5 million students by mid-century if current patterns persist.

The primary driver is widespread disappointment with public schools, cited for their rigidity, politicization, poor learning outcomes, and perceived politicized lessons. Parents' satisfaction with public schools consistently ranks lowest among educational options, while homeschooling enjoys a 70% favorability rating. This "fundamental shift" represents a lasting change in the American educational landscape.
chinese_title: 在家教育人数创历史新高
chinese_summary:
美国家庭教育正经历前所未有的增长，成为一种日益主流的教育选择。最初由新冠疫情停课和对远程学习的不满所引发的激增并未消退，反而预示着美国家庭教育方式的根本性和持久性转变。

约翰霍普金斯大学的安吉拉·沃森报告称，2024-2025年家庭教育的平均增长率为5.4%，几乎是疫情前2%增长率的三倍。超过三分之一的报告州达到了有史以来最高的家庭教育人数，甚至超过了疫情高峰期的水平。尽管疫情后曾出现短暂下降，但2023-2024年增长强劲反弹并持续至今，一些州的增幅超过20%。目前，全国家庭教育学生总数估计约占学生总数的6%，高于疫情前的3%，且这些数字可能低估了实际人数。

这一趋势是学生从传统公立学校大规模转向非公立教育选择的更广泛现象的一部分。波士顿大学和布鲁金斯学会的研究证实，全国公立学校入学人数显著下降，如果目前的模式持续下去，预计到本世纪中叶学生人数可能损失高达850万。

主要驱动因素是对公立学校普遍存在的失望，其原因包括僵化、政治化、学习成果不佳以及被认为带有政治色彩的课程。在所有教育选择中，家长对公立学校的满意度一直排名最低，而家庭教育则享有70%的好评率。这种“根本性转变”代表着美国教育格局的持久性变化。

title: Private Equity's New Venture: Youth Sports
summary:
Private equity firms are rapidly acquiring the $40 billion youth sports industry, shifting its focus from child development to profit maximization, often at the expense of families. A prime example is Black Bear Sports Group, the largest owner-operator of hockey rinks, which bans parents from recording their children's games. Instead, families are forced to subscribe to expensive exclusive streaming services like Black Bear TV, costing significantly more than professional sports streaming. Parents face threats of team penalties for non-compliance, a concern raised by Sen. Chris Murphy.

Black Bear and similar firms also impose new fees, such as a $50 "registration and insurance" charge, exacerbating already high costs for equipment, leagues, and travel. These rising expenses, averaging over $1,000 annually per child and $2,500 for hockey, are pricing lower-income families out of youth sports, turning it into a "sport of kings."

This trend extends beyond hockey; Unrivaled Sports consolidates baseball leagues, and Bain Capital-backed Varsity Brands dominates competitive cheerleading, imposing exclusive apparel and streaming (Varsity TV) and facing antitrust lawsuits. Critics argue this private equity playbook—acquiring distressed assets, loading with debt, slashing costs, and extracting maximum profit—degrades service quality and creates monopolies. Despite high prices, services like Black Bear TV face complaints about poor streaming quality. These practices control venues, leagues, tournaments, and even ratings, limiting choices and further inflating costs for families.
chinese_title: 私募股权的新尝试：青少年体育
chinese_summary:
私募股权公司正在迅速收购价值400亿美元的青少年体育产业，将其重心从儿童发展转向利润最大化，而这往往是以牺牲家庭利益为代价的。一个主要例子是黑熊体育集团，它是最大的冰球场馆所有者兼运营商，该集团禁止家长录制他们孩子的比赛。相反，家庭被迫订阅昂贵的独家流媒体服务，例如黑熊电视，其费用远高于专业体育流媒体。参议员克里斯·墨菲曾提出担忧，家长若不遵守规定将面临球队惩罚的威胁。

黑熊体育及类似公司还征收新费用，例如50美元的“注册和保险”费，这加剧了本已高昂的设备、联赛和差旅费用。这些不断上涨的开支，平均每个孩子每年超过1000美元，冰球项目则达到2500美元，正在将低收入家庭排挤出青少年体育领域，使其变成“国王的运动”。

这种趋势不仅限于冰球；无与伦比体育公司（Unrivaled Sports）整合棒球联赛，贝恩资本支持的Varsity Brands公司主导竞技啦啦队领域，强制推行独家服装和流媒体服务（Varsity TV），并面临反垄断诉讼。批评人士认为，这种私募股权的惯用策略——收购不良资产、背负债务、削减成本并榨取最大利润——正在降低服务质量并制造垄断。尽管价格高昂，黑熊电视等服务仍面临流媒体质量差的投诉。这些做法控制着场馆、联赛、锦标赛乃至评分，限制了选择，并进一步提高了家庭的开支。

title: Jmail: Gmail Clone with Epstein's Emails
summary:
The "Jmail" content describes a conceptual Gmail-like interface presenting what are claimed to be real emails of Jeffrey Epstein, allegedly released by Congress. The simulated user is logged in as Epstein, with access to browse, star, search, or view a random selection from a database of 2,235 emails.

The displayed emails, primarily from 2018-2019, illustrate a broad range of Epstein's communications. They include numerous news digests from sources like Quora and Flipboard, covering political events (e.g., Mueller investigation, Trump administration news, 2020 Democratic debates), financial updates, and general interest articles.

Notable correspondence features exchanges with individuals such as Steve Bannon, Joichi Ito, and Paul Morris, discussing political commentary, financial opportunities, and personal matters. Subjects also directly reference Epstein's own legal issues (his arrest, prosecutor's conduct), links to news articles, and organizational announcements. The content provides an overview of the types of digital communications and contacts associated with Jeffrey Epstein, as presented through this simulated platform.
chinese_title: Jmail：Gmail克隆版，内含爱泼斯坦邮件
chinese_summary:
“Jmail”内容描述了一个概念性的类似Gmail的界面，展示了据称是国会发布的、属于杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的真实电子邮件。模拟用户以爱泼斯坦的身份登录，可以浏览、加星标、搜索或随机查看一个包含2,235封电子邮件的数据库。

值得注意的通信包括与史蒂夫·班农、伊藤穰一和保罗·莫里斯等人的交流，讨论政治评论、金融机会和个人事务。主题还直接提及爱泼斯坦自身的法律问题（他的被捕、检察官的行为）、新闻文章链接以及组织公告。这些内容通过这个模拟平台，概述了与杰弗里·爱泼斯坦相关的数字通信和联系类型。

title: Virgin and Qantas to ban use of portable power banks after string of fires
summary:
Virgin Australia, Qantas, QantasLink, and Jetstar are implementing new bans on the use and charging of portable power banks during flights, effective December 1 and December 15, 2025, respectively. This decision follows a string of international and domestic lithium battery fires, including a mid-air incident on a Virgin Australia flight in July and an emergency landing by Air China.

Under the new rules, passengers are limited to two power banks in their carry-on baggage. Virgin Australia requires power banks to be easily accessible (not in overhead lockers) and permits up to 100 Wh unrestricted, with 100-160 Wh needing airline approval. Qantas and Jetstar will allow two power banks, each under 160 Wh. Crucially, power banks cannot be used or charged on board, though in-seat charging ports for other devices remain permissible. Power banks continue to be prohibited in checked baggage.

Virgin Australia's chief operations officer Chris Snook stated these changes align with international safety standards amidst a global increase in lithium battery devices carried by travellers. The Australian Transport Safety Bureau (ATSB) has recorded five in-flight power bank fires on Australian aircraft since 2016. The Flight Attendants Association of Australia (FAAA) has long called for tougher regulations, highlighting the dangers.

The Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) reported a 92% increase in lithium battery incidents between 2020-2022, issuing 17 power bank recalls. Many international airlines, including Emirates, Cathay Pacific, and Korean Air, have already banned power bank use on flights, making Australian carriers' new policies consistent with global safety standards.
chinese_title: 维珍航空和澳航因多起火灾将禁用移动电源。
chinese_summary:
维珍澳大利亚航空、澳洲航空、澳洲快运航空和捷星航空将分别于2025年12月1日和12月15日起，在航班上实施新的禁止使用和为便携式充电宝充电的规定。此决定是由于一系列国际和国内锂电池火灾事故引发的，其中包括7月份维珍澳大利亚航空一次航班上的空中事故以及中国国际航空的一次紧急降落。

根据新规定，乘客随身行李中携带的充电宝数量限制为两个。维珍澳大利亚航空要求充电宝易于取用（不可放在头顶储物柜中），并允许携带能量不超过100瓦时（Wh）的充电宝，无需申报；能量在100至160瓦时（Wh）之间的则需获得航空公司批准。澳洲航空和捷星航空将允许携带两个充电宝，每个的能量均不得超过160瓦时（Wh）。重要的是，充电宝在机上不能使用或充电，但用于其他设备的座椅充电端口仍然可以使用。充电宝仍然禁止托运。

维珍澳大利亚航空首席运营官克里斯·斯努克（Chris Snook）表示，这些变化符合国际安全标准，以应对全球旅客携带的锂电池设备数量的增加。澳大利亚运输安全局（ATSB）的数据显示，自2016年以来，澳大利亚飞机上已发生五起机上充电宝火灾。澳大利亚空乘协会（FAAA）长期以来一直呼吁更严格的规定，强调其潜在危险。

澳大利亚竞争与消费者委员会（ACCC）报告称，2020年至2022年间，锂电池事故增加了92%，并发布了17次充电宝召回。包括阿联酋航空、国泰航空和大韩航空在内的许多国际航空公司已经禁止在航班上使用充电宝，这使得澳大利亚航空公司的这项新政策与全球安全标准保持一致。

title: The New AI Consciousness Paper
summary:
A new paper by Yoshua Bengio, David Chalmers, and others in *Trends In Cognitive Science* addresses the often-poor discourse on AI consciousness. It restricts its focus to computational theories, examining models like Recurrent Processing Theory, Global Workspace Theory, and Higher Order Theory, which largely involve various "feedback mechanisms" in information processing.

The paper tentatively concludes that while current AI systems, like LLMs, are not conscious due to their feedforward nature, there are no technical barriers to building future AI architectures that satisfy these computational requirements for consciousness.

Philosophically, the paper commendably defines its target as "phenomenal consciousness" – the subjective, internal experience ("something it is like") – distinguishing it from "access consciousness" (information available for report). However, the present article's author criticizes the paper for then applying theories typically associated with access consciousness (e.g., Global Workspace Theory) to phenomenal consciousness. This conflation leads to "strange results," such as the implication that a company with a boss and employees communicating could be phenomenally conscious. The author questions the leap from computational feedback to genuine subjective experience, highlighting the fundamental difficulty in grounding phenomenal consciousness.
chinese_title: 新人工智能意识论文
chinese_summary:
Yoshua Bengio、David Chalmers 等人在《认知科学趋势》上发表的一篇新论文，旨在解决关于人工智能意识的普遍存在的低质量讨论。该论文将重点限制在计算理论上，考察了递归处理理论、全局工作空间理论和高阶理论等模型，这些模型在信息处理中很大程度上涉及各种“反馈机制”。

该论文初步得出结论，尽管当前的人工智能系统（如大型语言模型LLMs）由于其前馈性质而没有意识，但构建满足这些意识计算要求的未来人工智能架构没有技术障碍。

从哲学角度看，该论文值得称赞地将其目标定义为“现象意识”——即主观的、内在的体验（“有某种感受”）——并将其与“可及意识”（可供报告的信息）区分开来。然而，本文作者批评该论文随后将通常与可及意识相关的理论（例如全局工作空间理论）应用于现象意识。这种混淆导致了“奇怪的结果”，例如，这意味着一个有老板和员工进行沟通的公司可能拥有现象意识。作者质疑了从计算反馈到真正主观体验的这一飞跃，强调了将现象意识置于基础之上的根本性困难。

title: Tesla Robotaxi had 3 more crashes, now 7 total
summary:
Tesla has reported three more Robotaxi crashes in Austin, Texas, bringing its total to seven incidents since the service launched. These new crashes occurred in September 2025 and involved an animal, a cyclist, and a Robotaxi driving into a car backing up. Most incidents resulted in property damage, though one July crash caused minor injuries.

Tesla began reporting to NHTSA after moving in-car supervisors from the driver's to the passenger seat. Previously, it reported three crashes in July and one more last month. The fleet had covered roughly 250,000 miles by early November for four crashes, now totaling around 300,000 miles for seven.

The article notes Tesla's crash rate is approximately twice as high as Waymo's, despite the presence of human supervisors ready to intervene. A significant point of criticism is Tesla's practice of redacting crash narratives in its NHTSA reports, which prevents the public from understanding the details and fault, unlike other companies.

The author expresses concern, pointing out that 7 crashes in about 300,000 miles for Tesla is worrying, especially compared to the human average of one crash per 700,000 miles. A commenter also criticizes Tesla's "vision-only" approach, arguing it's insufficient for safe, unsupervised Level-4 autonomy, which typically relies on additional sensors like lidar or radar for reliability.
chinese_title: 特斯拉自动驾驶出租车再添3起撞车事故，累计已达7起。
chinese_summary:
特斯拉报告了在德克萨斯州奥斯汀发生的另外三起Robotaxi（自动驾驶出租车）事故，使其服务启动以来的事故总数达到七起。这些新事故发生在2025年9月，涉及动物、骑自行车的人，以及一辆Robotaxi撞上了一辆正在倒车的汽车。大多数事故造成了财产损失，不过7月的一起事故导致了轻伤。

特斯拉在将车内监督员从驾驶座移至副驾驶座后，开始向美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）报告事故。此前，它在7月报告了三起事故，上个月又报告了一起。截至11月初，该车队在发生四起事故时已行驶了大约25万英里；现在发生七起事故时，总计行驶里程约为30万英里。

文章指出，尽管有随时准备干预的人类监督员，特斯拉的事故率大约是Waymo的两倍。一个重要的批评点是特斯拉在向NHTSA提交的报告中会删减事故叙述，这使得公众无法像了解其他公司事故那样了解事故细节和责任。

作者表示担忧，指出特斯拉在约30万英里内发生7起事故令人不安，特别是与人类平均每70万英里发生一起事故相比。一位评论员也批评了特斯拉的“纯视觉”方案，认为这不足以实现安全的、无人监督的L4级自动驾驶，L4级自动驾驶通常依靠激光雷达或毫米波雷达等额外传感器来确保可靠性。

title: Labor Department Won't Publish October Unemployment Rate
summary:
The Labor Department's Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) will not publish a standalone unemployment rate for October, a direct consequence of the recent government shutdown. Instead, the BLS announced it would release the November unemployment rate on December 16, with this report also incorporating data collected for October.

This decision marks an unprecedented situation for modern jobs data, creating a "statistical black hole" for the month of October. It will make it significantly more difficult for economists and policymakers to accurately assess the state of the labor market during that period, including the immediate impact of the government shutdown itself. While October data will be included, disaggregating it from November's figures will be challenging, potentially obscuring specific monthly trends.

Economists will face a longer wait for crucial labor market insights and will likely resort to other indicators like jobless claims or anecdotal evidence to piece together an understanding of October's employment landscape. The combined report on December 16 will also be published later than typical for a November jobs release, highlighting the significant disruption caused by the shutdown and the BLS's efforts to provide comprehensive data despite the delays.
chinese_title: 劳工部不会公布十月失业率
chinese_summary:
劳工部劳工统计局（BLS）将不会公布独立的十月份失业率，这是近期政府停摆的直接后果。相反，劳工统计局宣布将于12月16日发布11月份失业率，该报告也将包含10月份收集的数据。

这一决定标志着现代就业数据史无前例的情况，为十月份制造了一个“统计黑洞”。这将使经济学家和政策制定者更难以准确评估该时期的劳动力市场状况，包括政府停摆本身的直接影响。尽管10月份数据会被包含在内，但要将其从11月份的数据中分离出来将极具挑战性，可能掩盖具体的月度趋势。

经济学家将需要更长时间才能获得关键的劳动力市场洞察，并可能诉诸其他指标，如失业金申请或坊间证据，来拼凑出对10月份就业状况的理解。12月16日发布的这份合并报告也将比通常的11月就业报告发布时间晚，这凸显了停摆造成的重大干扰以及劳工统计局尽管面临延误仍努力提供全面数据的决心。

title: Implementation of a Java Processor on a FPGA (2016)
summary:
In "Implementation of a Java Processor on a FPGA" (2016), Omkar Joshi addresses the performance drawbacks of Java applications, which stem from the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)'s role in interpreting and translating Java bytecodes into native processor instructions. While Java's architectural neutrality and portability contribute to its widespread popularity, this interpretation process, along with functionalities like dynamic linking, introduces significant execution overhead compared to natively compiled programs.

To mitigate this, Joshi developed a specialized processor where Java bytecodes are the native instructions. This innovative approach eliminates the time-consuming interpretation and translation steps, thereby accelerating Java application execution. Furthermore, the project aims to enhance efficiency by pre-processing class files, reducing run-time dependencies before loading them into the processor's memory.

The processor is implemented on a Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA), offering crucial advantages. The FPGA platform allows the Java Machine to be updated with new Java standards even after field installation, ensuring its longevity and relevance. Additionally, FPGAs enable application-specific optimization by integrating custom hardware modules, further boosting processing speed for particular tasks. Key concepts in this work include FPGA, Java Virtual Machine, and Java processor. This Master's thesis was completed at The University of Texas at Arlington.
chinese_title: 基于FPGA的Java处理器实现 (2016)
chinese_summary:
Omkar Joshi在2016年发表的《在FPGA上实现Java处理器》一文中，探讨了Java应用程序的性能缺陷，这些缺陷源于Java虚拟机（JVM）在解释和翻译Java字节码为原生处理器指令过程中扮演的角色。尽管Java的架构中立性和可移植性使其广受欢迎，但这种解释过程，以及动态链接等功能，相比于原生编译程序，引入了显著的执行开销。

title: Building a Minimal Viable Armv7 Emulator from Scratch
summary:
The article details the creation of "stinkarm," a Minimal Viable Armv7 Emulator built from scratch in Rust. The author aimed for zero dependencies and completed the project in 1.3k lines, driven by a desire to understand the ELF format, ARM 32-bit instruction encoding, and assembly execution for a future JIT compiler project.

Stinkarm functions as a userspace emulator, parsing and validating 32-bit ARM binaries, mapping segments into host memory, decoding a subset of ARM instructions, translating guest and host memory interactions, and forwarding ARM Linux syscalls to x86-64 System V syscalls. It can execute a "hello world" binary in 1.9ms (0.015ms raw emulation), making it ~100-1000x slower than native ARMv7, but demonstrating its viability.

The development process involved creating a build script (`bld_exmpl`) and Nix flake to compile ARMv7 assembly on a non-ARM system. A significant part of the article focuses on ELF parsing. The emulator strictly validates the 52-byte `Elf32_Ehdr` for correct magic bytes, 32-bit class, little-endian data, current version, ARM machine type, and executable type. It then uses `phoff` and `phentsize` from this header to locate and interpret `Elf32_Phdr` entries, which describe program segments. Rust's `TryFrom` trait and custom `le16!` and `le32!` macros are utilized for safe and type-checked parsing of little-endian byte sequences.

title: The Qtile Window Manager: A Python-Powered Tiling Experience
summary:
This article details the author's journey from XFCE to the Qtile window manager, attracted by its Python-powered configuration. Emphasizing isolation, the author describes installing Qtile within a Python 3.10 virtual environment in `/opt/qtile` using the `deadsnakes` PPA, and configuring a `.desktop` entry and `~/.xsessionrc` for startup services like wallpaper restoration.

The core of the article showcases a highly customized Qtile setup built on principles of modularity, adaptive behavior, practical keybindings, and visual consistency. Key features include a custom color scheme and unique assets (like a "straw-hat" icon), smart mouse movement for multi-monitor setups, and logical Vim-style keybindings.

Leveraging Python's power, the configuration integrates hardware-aware widgets that detect battery presence, display dynamic IP addresses, and monitor AMD GPU VRAM usage via `amdgpu_top`. Screen layouts adapt dynamically to the number of connected monitors, providing richer information on the primary display. Startup hooks (`autostart.sh`, `reload.sh`) manage scripts for initial setup and reloads.

Lessons learned highlight the immense power of Python for complex logic, the value of iterative customization, the necessity of hardware awareness, and performance considerations. Future plans include developing custom widgets for notifications, tmux, Kubernetes, and enhancing multi-monitor support and external integrations. The author concludes that Qtile has significantly transformed and boosted their Linux desktop productivity.

title: Why Samsung Phones Are Failing Emergency Calls in Australia
summary:
Samsung phones in Australia are failing to connect to the Triple Zero (000) emergency line, an issue linked to at least one death and putting thousands at risk. This critical problem stems from Australia's 3G network shutdown (2023-2024), which exposed flaws in Voice-over-LTE (VoLTE) functionality on 4G and 5G devices.

Unlike robust 2G/3G circuit-switched calls, VoLTE is a data-based system that lacks consistent global interoperability. Many older 4G/5G phones, particularly certain Samsung models, were either sold without proper VoLTE implementation or fail to make emergency calls when roaming or using specific network providers. For instance, some Samsung phones fail to connect 000 when only the Vodafone network is available, even if they work on Telstra or Optus.

Samsung has identified affected models: older devices from 2016-2017 (e.g., Galaxy S7) require replacement, while newer ones (e.g., Galaxy S20+, S21 Ultra 5G) can be fixed with software updates. Telecoms are contacting customers, with non-compliant devices facing bans from networks.

This issue isn't unique to Australia; European authorities have noted similar VoLTE emergency calling failures, especially when international roaming. The problem highlights the loose standardization of VoLTE, which, unlike older reliable 2G/3G systems, fails to guarantee emergency call functionality across all networks as 2G/3G services are phased out globally.
